choices: Himself
One of his parents
His sister Amber
One of the twins
His best buddy Jerome
1.content:
It was a very hot spring day when the entire Smith family was at home; each doing their own thing.

Debby was slaving away in the large kitchen, preparing the barbecue dinner for that afternoon, while Frank was in the garage to free the large grill from its winter hide-out. He cursed as a large dumbbell rolled from a shelf above the grill, hitting the concrete floor leaving a crack. He accidentally hit the shelf as he was trying to move the heavy barbecue. It was hidden behind a new weight bench his oldest son had managed to score cheap at work; it was a shame that he hardly used it though. Frank tried to pick up the 30lbs dumbbell, but it was a lot heavier than he thought. “Maybe I should start using the weight bench” he joked as he managed to put the dumbbell back on the shelf with two hands.

Meanwhile, Debby was cutting some onions when her eyes went all watery. She tried to rub the water out of her eyes with her sleeve, but it didn’t help much. The onions were too strong. She looked up at the window and through her tears she could see a faint silhouette of her neighbor from across the street: Joe Daniels. He was in his late twenties, single and had recently moved in. Debby dried her eyes once more, and blinked to adjust focus. Across the street, her hunky neighbor was mowing his front lawn…shirtless! She could hardly believe what she saw; Joe obviously took good care of his body. As she was reminding herself to bake a nice apple pie and go over to introduce herself, Joe spotted her gaze. He waved at her as he wiped his sweat off of his face and torso. Debby, broken out of her day dream, waved back with red cheeks and continued mincing her onions.

In the backyard the twins Dylan and Davy were enjoying the sun, each in their own way: Dylan was practicing cartwheels, while Davy read his favorite comic.

Inside the house, on the first floor, oldest son Justin was changing out of his work costume. He just came back from Wal-Mart, where he works at the sports section. He was about to put on something more casual for dinner. His best buddy and co-worker Jerome was also in the room, wearing a wife beater. He was playing with Justin’s football on the edge of the bed, when Justin unbuttoned his shirt.

“Dude! You have GOT to start working out if you want to have ANY success with the ladies…” Jerome said as he saw Justin’s shirtless body.

“Shut up!” Justin responded a bit agitated “You start to sound like Coach Graham!”

“Well sorry…but I’m just saying…” Jerome approached Justin “…this is just more what the ladies like!” He flexed his sleeveless arm next to Justin’s; the contrast in both size as well as skin color was amusing. Jerome, being Afro-American, had the darkest skin tone you could imagine; while Justin’s milky white skin was the exact opposite.

Justin placed his free hand on Jerome’s flexed biceps, squeezed slightly and then pushed him away. From any other person with arms like Jerome’s, he would be jealous as hell, but he couldn’t be jealous of his best buddy. He smirked. “I see! And tell me again how much luck those arms have given you with the ladies…?”

Jerome started laughing. Both boys told each other everything, even the juicy bits concerning girl, and Justin knew Jerome hadn’t had much luck with the girl he had a crush on. “Touché buddy! You’ve got me!”

Justin quickly threw on a shirt and both boys went downstairs. As they passed the front door, Amber, Justin’s little sister, came home from a long day at school. Just as she opened the door, Jerome passed by it. He looked Amber straight in the eyes and smiled. “Hi!” he said softly as he followed Justin to the kitchen. Amber blushed; her brother’s hot friend just said hi to her. She put aside her bag and followed everyone else into the kitchen.

Debby welcomed her only daughter with a kiss on her forehead, much to Amber’s embarrassment as Jerome was in the same room. She quickly looked if Jerome had spotted the kiss, but he was pre-occupied with talking to Justin. They were discussing girl friend material, and Amber couldn’t help but overhear Jerome talking about Priscilla from down the road.

Amber knew Priscilla as the tall, bitchy former-captain of the cheerleading squad at her school. Now that she is at college, she has similar classes as Justin and Jerome. She was gorgeous, yet a bit terrifying, with her full 6 feet ripped physique. Her arms rivaled most college boys; in fact Amber thinks her biceps might be bigger than Justin’s.

“Priscilla Newton? From down the road? The girl with the freaky arms; you dig her?”

“Yeah, she’s hot! I like my girl to have a bit of muscle…means they’re great in bed!”

“Dude! You’re sick! She looks like a man!”

“Come on, it’s not that bad. Her body is hot! I can’t help it she’s got bigger arms than you!” Jerome said as he squeezed Justin’s upper arm. He wasn’t expecting that at all, causing him to almost drop the glass of coke on the floor.

“Hey, watch out!” he laughed “Oh mom, that reminds me, is it OK if Jerome stays for dinner?”

“It’s fine by me, if his mom is OK with it….”

“Yeah, I just phoned her up, it was no problem” Jerome intervened.

“Well then, be my guest!” Debby said. “Could you boys go check on your dad; he should be firing up the grill by now, but I haven’t seen him leave the garage at all….”

“Sure thing mom!” Justin said as he signed his buddy to follow him outside.

“And could you give me a hand with these peppers, Amber?” Debby asked Amber who was gazing at Jerome’s body. “Amber? Hello, earth to Amber!”

Her eyes were fixated on the dark brown arms that escaped the black wife beater as Jerome walked out the kitchen. She imagined how those strong arms could hold her close to his body; how she would be safe and protected. And then his ass; round and protruding, she would be more than happy to pinch it…if only once.

“Amber?!” her mother yelled one final time. She snapped out of her daydream.

“What? Oh sorry mom! What is it?”

Debby smiled. She knew exactly what her little girl was doing. “Could you please help me cut these peppers in small bits?” she said as she turned around and directed her stare outside at Joe, who was still mowing the lawn shirtless. She sighed.

Meanwhile in the garage, Frank was sweating like a pig. He had just managed to move the weight bench over to the side, making room for the grill to go through, but he had not calculated in its weight. As he did the best he could pushing the grill towards the door leading to the backyard, he didn’t hear his son and Jerome enter.

“Woah dad, take it easy, you’re turning red!” Justin said as he padded his dad on the back. “Do you need a hand?”

“Oh hi boys! Man, this thing is heavier than I remembered! I could sure use two strapping young boys like yourselves; especially you Jerome!” Frank said as he took a good look at Jerome’s sleeveless arms.

Jerome laughed. “Thanks Mr Smith!”

“Hey!” Justin yelled “Don’t underestimate me…dad!”

Jerome laughed even harder. Justin threw him a nasty look.

“Well…nevermind, just help me out, will you!” Frank directed the boys each to a side of the grill. “On three; one...two...THREE!”

With the help of the two boys, the grill was easily lifted several inches off the ground. It was still extremely heavy, even when the weight was supported by three grown men, but they managed to carry it outside and install it on the deck.

Not much later the grill was heating up and as the entire family, plus Jerome, was enjoying a nice meal, the doorbell suddenly rang.

“Who could that be?” Frank asked Debby.

“I don’t know, I’m not expecting anyone…”

“I’ll go!” Justin said as he left the table.

Not a minute later he came back with a large box in his hands. It had a large red bow and an envelope attached to it, which he had opened and started reading.

“Who is Vanessa, dad?” Justin asked as he approached the entire family.

Frank’s head turned red. “Oh, just a colleague of mine…”

Debby looked at her husband suspiciously.

“Well, she obviously likes you a lot. This is what she wrote: Dear Frank, when I saw this little device, I had to think of you instantly. It will fix your problems and make you irresistible! Use it wisely! Love, Vanessa”

Now Debby looked at her husband furiously. “’Love, Vanessa’?!? Frank…Is there something you’re not telling me?”

“No honey, there is nothing!”, he lied, “she’s just a good colleague. I bet she just send me over a bottle of perfume or something like that…she’s like that!”

“Well, it’s no perfume!” Justin said as he had opened the box and looked inside. With one hand he reached into the box and pulled out a toy gun; or at least it looked like one.

“What’s that? A toy gun?” Amber remarked as everyone else around the table was surprised by the little gift. “What is she, like 6?”

Justin started laughing. “Dad, this is ridiculous. Is she playing a prank on you or something?” He held the gun in his hand like you would hold a normal gun and started pointing it at different members of the family. He even imitated space-age noises as he shot his family and friend.

Then, when pointing at one specific member of the family, he accidentally pulled the trigger and a blue beam shot out of the barrel of the gun, engulfing the person in a blue haze. It was…
1.title: The parcel

11.content:
As Justin pretended to shoot all his family members with the strange looking gun his father had just received, he couldn’t help but think if something would happen if he did pull the trigger. This thought kept creeping through his mind as he fake-blasted every family member that was at the table. He couldn’t just try and shoot his brothers or sister, or even worse one of his parents, and see what would happen. What if the thing could kill someone? That would be irresponsible.

He finished playing with the device and noticed everyone around the table losing interest. After they finished laughing, they turned to their plates and continued eating. But Justin, still the only one standing, couldn’t put the gun down without finding out what it could do. His curiosity won over. Perhaps there was a clue somewhere on the gun.

He started inspecting the gun a little closer; he turned it around, look at every nook and cranny, but couldn’t find anything besides the trigger and the barrel. Until he looked at the underside of the handle; there was a small inscription. He couldn’t quite make out what it was, so he held the gun closer.

Little did he know that while he was rotating the gun to get a better look, he accidentally pulled the trigger, letting the gun shoot out a blue ray at his own chest, engulfing him in it completely for several seconds. Everybody at the table looked up in shock at what happened to the 19-year-old.
11.title: Oops, clumsy me!

Someone else has grabbed the gun and is about to shoot

111.content:
There he was, frozen solid, the only one standing at the end of the table. He held the gun in his right hand as he saw flashes of blue light taking over his vision. As a blur he saw his family and friend turn their heads towards him; their expressions shocked.

He let the gun drop to the ground as a tingling sensation took over his body, starting at his chest. Every known body in his body started to tingle; it was an odd sensation.

Then he vision came back; the blue flashes had stopped. In front of him were his family and his best buddy, all looking at him with their mouths open. The tingling sensation slowly subsided.

“What the hell was that?!?” Dylan yelled the first.

“Oh my goodness, you’ve shot yourself?!” his mother added quite upset.

“How do you feel, son? Are you alright?” his dad questioned.

“I…I don’t know what it was, but I feel fi…” Justin started, when another type of sensation took over his body. This time it hurt more; it was a burning sensation. It started in his chest and soon took over every other muscle in his body. As an automatic reaction, Justin grabbed his stomach and hunched forward. He screamed and grunted from the pain. He even cried. As the burning sensation reached his legs, he let himself fall to the concrete floor. The entire family shot up from their seats and gathered around him.

There he lay, on the ground, in a fetal position, kicking, crying and screaming in pain. “Make it stop! Please make it stop!” he managed to cry. His dad positioned himself next to his son’s head and grabbed him closer. He tried to calm his son on his lap. Justin grabbed his dad’s arm and clenched on to it. The sensation in his body did not stop; it was killing him.

“Look!”, Dylan yelled, “His Shoulder!!!”

The entire group focused their attention on Justin’s shoulder, which seemed to…inflate?!? It rapidly grew larger and wider, pushing further away from his neck. His other shoulder did the exact same thing. The fabric of his t-shirt began to cling tighter to his body. Justin turned on his back, screaming in pain, as he exposed his growing chest.

“Oh my god, he’s building muscles by the second!” Amber said as she looked on as Justin’s chest expanded. Two slabs of meat were growing beneath his skin.

“Just like the Hulk!” Davy screamed excited. He couldn’t believe his own brother was hulking out of his clothes right in front of him.

The garden was suddenly filled with stretching and bone cracking noises, paired with screams and primal grunts. Whatever Justin was going through, it hurt!

He turned back on his stomach, exposing his growing back. It grew wider and wider, leaving little room for his shirt. That’s when the seams started to give way; his expanding body was ripping through his shirt.

“Wow, look at his back…those muscles!” Dylan yelled from excitement.

The tears in his t-shirt grew larger as more of his back was exposed. All the muscles in his back tightened and relaxed after one another. The remainder of the ripped shirt was riding up his torso, indicating that he did not only grow wider, but taller as well.

Justin held his arms close to his body as he was still clinging onto his father’s arm. Frank looked down at the hands grabbing his wrist as he felt the grip tighten. He saw Justin’s biceps and triceps inflate and lengthen, getting more defined and sculpting his upper arms. The sleeves of his shirt could no longer contain the growing biceps; causing them to rip apart like the rest of his shirt.

Justin’s growing torso was still resting on Frank’s lap. His son’s transformation made him much heavier, weighing down considerably on his thighs. It hurt. With his free hand, he grabbed Justin’s bull-like neck and asked “Justin, I know you’re in there…can you hear me? You are hurting me! Please, if you can…let go of my arm!”

Frank did not think it would work, but to his surprise the grip in Justin’s hands started to loosen. Fighting the transformation that took place in his body, the boy managed to do what his father had asked. He let go of his father’s arm and placed his hands flat on the ground. Then he pushed up his upper body with his newly grown arms; he was now resting on his stretched arms and knees. But his legs hadn’t fully grown yet.

As if they got an electric shock, his legs stretched out completely, making his pelvis collapse to the ground. He almost hit his sister Amber, who could jump out of the way in time, with his growing limb. His legs first grew larger, growing out of his trousers, making them look like board shorts. Then they started expanding with muscle, filling up every available space in the jeans, just until they started ripping. First the seams, then the actual fabric. Unlike the Hulk, Justin’s entire jeans ripped off, leaving him exposed only in his white CK boxer briefs. His waist and glutes were just growing too big to remain contained in a ripped off version of his jeans.

After almost 5 minutes the burning sensation in Justin’s muscles began to fade away. He was still resting on all fours, his head facing down. His family and best friend were circled around him, taking in every rippling muscle on his back as it rose up and down when he breathed.

Frank noticed his son’s transformation came to an end when the stretching sounds disappeared. “Son….how, how are you feeling?” he said as he placed his hand on his back. His skin was hot; it radiated heat.

“Fine…” a dark voice boomed from under the person. He started lifting his head, uncontrollably flexing his traps. Frank felt the muscle tissue under his hand harden. “What happened to me?”

“You…you grew…” Frank replied.

Justin faced his head towards his father. He smiled. Then he rotated and looked at the rest of his family and his best friend. They all looked at him with their mouths open and their eyes wide. He looked back at his dad again.

“I…I grew?!?”

“Yes son, look at yourself! Look at your body…” his dad proposed.

Justin pushed his upper body back, shifting his weight so that he could sit on his knees. Then he looked down. All he saw were two enormous slabs of meat blocking his view. He moved his right arm, when his right pec twitched up, becoming rock hard. As he looked at his arm, his own eyes grew wide as well. He was looking at the biggest, must fully developed, hardly any body fat containing arm he had ever seen. This couldn’t be his. He bent his lower arm, his biceps popped into action. He reached out with his other arm, touching his biceps. He made a fist, flexing the biceps rock solid. He felt it again.

“Oh…my…fucking…god!!”

He quickly hunched forward, looking over his chest down at his stomach. A chiseled eight-pack, usually only seen on male fitness models on those awful home shopping channels, was diving down into his stretched-out boxer briefs. His thighs were enormous, almost as big as his waist used to be he reckoned.

The entire family looked on as Justin was exploring his new body for the very first time. Some of them were just as excited as Justin, while others were worried. Mostly his mother.

Justin felt he had enough energy to take on the world. He leaned forward, placing one hand flat on the floor, as he pushed his ass up. He was getting ready to stand up, though it proved more difficult in this new body. As he slowly started to rise in the air, he passed every one of his family members in height; Amber, his mom, the twins, Jerome…even his dad. They all tilted their heads up to continue following Justin’s face. Finally Justin reached his new full height; he looked over everyone present.

“Jesus, you’re a giant!” Amber yelled.

Justin looked down and grinned. “You’re not scared of me, are you?”
111.title: Justin, the Hulk

1113.content:
Amber looked up at her brother; he was massive, hulking with muscle towering over everyone. Yet she wasn’t scared; somehow she knew her brother wouldn’t harm her, even if he easily could with his new frame.

“You’re not scared of me, are you?” Justin replied to Amber’s conclusion. He tried to look as scary as possible, flexing his entire torso in a most muscular pose.

Amber looked at him, not frightened at all, and started laughing. She placed her hand on one of Justin’s broad shoulders and said: “For you? Why should I? You’re my big bro…you’ll never scare me?” Then she walked passed him.

Justin’s angry expression melted from his face as he had no effect on his sister. How could that be? He turned around and grabbed his sister from behind, lifting her off of her feet, several inches into the air. He hollowed his back, lifting Amber even higher, as he started tickling her. Amber, very ticklish, started laughing and kicking her feet all around.

“No no! Stop! Stop it!” she said laughing.

“So…still not scared of me now?!” Justin said laughing as well as he continued tickling.

The twins saw how Justin just opened the famous Smith family tickle-attack, and initiated their own attack. “Charge!!!!”

Both boys jumped onto Justin’s towering body and started tickling him. Justin was now carrying his three siblings, who were all kicking, screaming and laughing, without too much trouble. Unaware to the twins, his new thick skin made him immune for tickling, yet he decided to play along.

“Oh no, they’re killing me!” he yelled as he let himself slowly fall on his knees. Dad, mom and Jerome looked on laughing as the three siblings were trying to get down the beast. They had so much fun, laughing out loud, ultimately ending on the ground, tickling each other.

The evening went by quickly. No-one was scared of the hulking teen and Justin himself started to get used to his new height and weight. The twins were impressed with his body and inspected every muscle, which Justin happily flexed. After a while, Jerome went home and Justin was getting tired. He had to get to college the next morning, so he said goodnight and went up to his room. His bed squeaked under the new weight, but it managed to not fall apart.

The next morning, the alarm went off quite early. At 6am, Justin launched his arm on his alarm clock, completely smashing it to bits. He immediately sat up straight in his bed, awake, looking down at his body, rubbing the sleep out of his eyes he blinked again and looked down again.

“So it wasn’t a dream…I just forgot how strong I was…” he said as he looked at the smashed alarm clock. He flexed his arm and felt his biceps. “Damn, I think I’ll never get enough of that!”

As he felt his own flexed arm he felt something else twitch under his bed sheets. He opened them and looked down at his crotch. “Oh holy mother of god…it’s massive!” There, through his maximally stretched boxer briefs, was the biggest boner he had experienced in his life. Everything had grown on his body to match the proportions, even that.

At first he was too afraid to touch it, but he figured it was part of him now, so why not. He put his big hand into his boxer briefs and tried to push his morning wood down. As he let go of it, it jumped straight back up. “Well, that was useless” he said to himself. He figured it might just go away if he stopped thinking about it, as it usually did. He headed for the shower, but as he entered the bathroom and saw his own full reflection in the mirror, his boner sprang to full mast again, almost tearing through the stretch cotton of his underwear. It was the first time he saw his own new body at full-size, and even he was blown away.

“Damn!” He flexed every available muscle, inspecting every body part is his physique, before finally getting into the shower. He jacked off to his reflection while in the shower, leading to the best masturbation of his life.

He had a hard time finding clothing that fit; the only thing that was somewhat suitable was his sweatpants and sweatshirt. They were usually about a size too big, hanging loosely over his body, but now they were stretched skin tight over his physique. It was a funny sight to behold, yet it was the only thing he could find on this short notice. “Mental note: have to get out and buy some new clothes, soon!”

After an extensive breakfast, he ate more than usual, his buddy Jerome rang the door to pick him up for school.

“Dude! I forgot how big you were!” Jerome said as Justin opened the door.

“Yeah, so did I when I woke up this morning!”

The two boys headed towards Jerome’s car. It was a tight fit, but Justin managed to squeeze himself in on the passenger’s seat. The entire car’s suspension shifted towards the right.

“Well, here we go!”, Jerome said as he started his car, “I’m so curious how everybody is going to react on your new physique…”

“Yeah, so am I…”, Justin said as he was thinking about Kim, the hottest girl at college, “Do you think Kim will like me now?”

“Kim!?”, Jerome said a bit surprised, “THE Kim? You fancy her? Damn, so do I…but I hardly stand a chance against you…look at you!”

Justin laughed. “Ah, sorry buddy! Life’s unfair, isn’t it…?” He laughed harder, softly punching Jerome on the shoulder.

“Ouch, watch out where you punch, Hercules”, Jerome said as he rubbed his shoulder.

“Oh sorry buddy, I did it as soft as I could. Still need to get used to these!” Justin said as he raised his arms in the air and flexed both of them. It was a tight fit in the car, but his biceps popped to full size, further stretching out the sleeves of his sweat shirt.

113.content:
Scared from the blue haze he saw in front of his eyes, Justin dropped the gun out of his hands. It fell on the ground, not broken. When the haze disappeared, everyone around the table was staring at Justin with eyes and mouths open.

“Justin, honey, are you feeling alright?” his mother asked.

“Uh, yeah, I guess so…what was that?” Justin asked a bit dozy.

“A strange blue ray came out of the gun, and it hit you!” Davy explained.

“Hmm, strange. I feel nothing! I feel fine actually…”, Justin concluded, “I guess it was nothing. Let’s continue our dinner…”

Justin picked up the gun from the floor and put it back in the box. Then he put the box aside on the ground and went back to his seat. “Man I’m starving! Is there any meat left?”

“Just a minute”, Justin’s dad said, “I’ve almost got a rib eye ready for you!”

The whole family continued eating, some more than others. To Debby’s surprise, Justin ate more than usual. He was beginning on his fourth steak; usually he’s full after his second. She figured he must just be hungry from work.

After dinner, while Debby and Amber were cleaning off the table, all the boys were still at the table. Dylan, the athletic twin, had been eyeing Jerome’s upper arm up and down all throughout dinner and finally dared to ask him a question.

“Jerome?”

“Yeah buddy, what is it?”

“How big are your arms?”

Jerome laughed. He was flattered that his best friend’s little brother noticed the hard work he had put in his arms. “These babies, the last time I’ve checked they were close to 15 inches, flexed.”

“And how much time do you work out to get those arms?”

“I workout about four times a week…”

Justin laughed.

“What are you laughing at?” Jerome sneered at Justin “If you finally get your lazy ass off the ground and start to work out with me like I proposed over a dozen times, maybe then you can have arms like these!” He lifted both his arms in the air and flexed his biceps to nice 15 inch peaks.

Dylan’s eyes grew wide. “Wow! Can I touch them?”

“Sure thing!” Jerome said as Dylan approached him. “It’s nice to see that at least someone in this family appreciates hard work and dedication!”

Justin did not respond. Davy, the silent twin, adjusted his glasses as he looked at his big brother. Was he seeing things or did his shirt look tighter on his body?

“Can you give me some tips on building bigger arms?”, Dylan asked Jerome, “Coach said I need to grow more muscles if I want to perform the exercises properly…”

“Sure thing!”, Jerome replied, “but first let me see what you’ve got!”

Dylan obliged and flexed his arms as hard as he could. A nice, separated, biceps popped up.

“Wow, impressive! We need to get those measured!” Jerome suggested.

“Already on it!” Dylan yelled as he ran inside to find a tape measure. After a minute he returned. He flexed his arms again and Jerome put the tape around it.

“Wow, impressive kid! 13.5 inch! For a 15-year-old that’s impressive! They might even be bigger than Justin’s!” Jerome joked, knowing how much trouble his best buddy had with developing his body.

“You think so? Justin, flex yours!” Dylan asked excited.

“Nah, I don’t want to…” he responded.

“You don’t want to get humiliated in front of your little brother…” Jerome added.

Davy, now mesmerized by the body of his bigger brother, clearly noticed something was up. Given his comic book knowledge, he easily figured out the gun must have been part of it. He intervened.

“Why don’t you guys arm-wrestle…?”

Justin, Jerome and Dylan all looked at the geeky kid.

“That way, you can easily decide who’s the strongest of you all” he added.

“That’s not such a crazy idea!” Dylan said as he lined up his arm towards his bigger brother. “Us first; the winner against Jerome!”

“But Jerome’s clearly gonna win from me…” Justin decided.

“But who said you can beat me; maybe I’m stronger than you…” his little brother responded full of confidence.

Justin reluctantly agreed. As he placed his non-flexed arm on the table, both Jerome and Dylan’s eyes grew wide. “Dude, what’s that?”

Justin, unaware of his physical changes, looked down at his arm and saw veins crawling all over his arm, which in general looked way bigger than before. His mouth fell open, but he decided to play along. He refrained himself from flexing as he said “What? Don’t tell me you’re scared all of a sudden…?”

Dylan, not scared for the challenge, positioned his arm opposite his brother’s and the two locked hands.

“On three”, Jerome, the referee, decided, “one…two…three!”

Dylan started pushing his brother’s hand down, but to both his and Jerome’s surprise, the arm didn’t budge. He pressed harder, but the counter force was too strong. He looked up at Justin’s face, who looked relax. “So when are you gonna apply some force?” Justin asked jokingly.

Dylan could not understand; he was sure his bigger brother was as thin as a twig. He had muscles from gymnastics, his brother had none. All the times before they arm-wrestled, he had won. How come Justin suddenly contains these huge arms? He started applying more pressure by throwing his entire weight into the game. The arm of Justin budged a little bit. It was working. He noticed Justin’s face change as Dylan was winning.

As Justin’s arm was halfway down, Justin’s free hand rolled up his sleeve, exposing his full upper arm for all the boys to see. The muscle in his arm didn’t look flexed at all. Justin looked his little brother straight in the eye and whispered: “my turn!”

Then, as if out of nowhere, his arm grew into a clear cut biceps peak. The force Dylan was fighting against had ten folded; he couldn’t stand a chance. Within a second, Justin has overtaken the match and pinned his little brother’s 13.5 inch arm to the table.

“Dude! Your arm! It’s massive!” Jerome exclaimed in shock.

Justin could only laugh. He didn’t know, until the match, what was happening to him, but now he had an explanation. After he shot himself with the gun, he felt funny inside. A tingling sensation all over his body. He discarded it as nothing, as it wasn’t bothering him, but he knew something was up. Perhaps he was getting a cold; nothing to worry about. But then he felt his clothes getting tighter and this massive arm appeared out of his sleeve. He knew he could beat his brother. His self-confidence grew.

“Thanks! Now don’t tell me you’re afraid to go against me…?” he asked Jerome.

“No, of course not, bring it on! I bet I’m still stronger than you!”

Dylan, rubbing his arm from the pain, went to sit next to his twin brother, who looked in awe at Justin’s ripped upper arm. Davy knew something was up, and it turned out right!

The two best friends positioned themselves opposite each other; with their right arms on the table they interlocked hands.

“Can someone count us off?” Jerome asked the twins.

“Sure thing!”, Dylan agreed, “one…two…three!”

The two boys started off their match; it was obvious to Justin Jerome was a better match than his little brother. It would be difficult to beat him, based on the force he had to apply. In both boys’ arms the biceps popped up like balloons getting inflated.

After a minute, not moving an inch, Justin was certain he met his equal. He tried one last time to push everything he got out of his arm and…
113.title: Fit Justin

1133.content:
The arm-wrestling match was an equal duel between the best buddies since kindergarten. Jerome’s naturally trained, chocolate brown pipe was an equal match against Justin’s recently acquired milk white python.

“Man, look at them go! Who knew Justin was this strong…I sure didn’t!” Dylan told his twin brother.

“Well, Justin wasn’t really before…” Davy said.

“Before what?”

“Oh never mind, you’ll never understand…”

Dylan didn’t have the energy to argue with his brother; he was too much involved with the match of his big brother.

“They haven’t moved their arms like…in the last 2 minutes. Wow!”

“Oh, I might know what can help that…” Davy said as he left his seat. He went straight to the box, took out the gun and pointed it indiscreetly at Justin. Then he fired.

Justin, unaware of what his little brother was doing, looked into Jerome’s eyes. He saw the brute strength in his expression; he never knew he would be able to match that. Next he looked down at his arm; the arm that felt like it didn’t belong to him. He was starting to become curious what the rest of his body must look like now, as he figured his arm wasn’t the only thing that got more muscular. His bulging biceps, exposed as he had rolled up his sleeve, was throbbing with power. Veins grew larger, encapsulating it, feeding it with blood and oxygen.

Then the blue haze returned. For a second he was blinded with blue light. As his vision returned he looked around to see his little brother standing there with the gun pointed at his body. He knew what has happened, and he couldn’t be more happy with it. “This will show Jerome!”

11331.content:
For over three minutes now, the boys were still locked into the same position, unable to push the other down. Justin, however, felt more energetic than before. He had a good reason, as he was just zapped for a second time by the strange gun his dad received just moments ago.

As before, it must take some time, but Justin felt extra strength building up in his body. He looked at Jerome, who was looking down at his own arm, inspecting its bulging biceps. Apparently his best buddy had not noticed what Davy, his youngest brother, had done to him. Then he looked at Dylan, who was the referee of the match. He was so pre-occupied with comparing his arms with those of Jerome and Justin, that he hadn’t noticed a thing either.

Justin looked back at Davy again; who winked. He couldn’t be more proud of his little brother as this match otherwise had no end. And this ending fancied him; he couldn’t wait to finally beat his friend who had always been the strongest of the two.

Another minute had passed and Justin started to feel the effects of the ray. The tingling sensation returned all over his body. This weakened him ever so slightly, opening up an opportunity for Jerome to attack. Jerome, now grinning from ear to ear, saw Justin’s arm move closer and closer to the table. But after he passed the 45 degree angle, the force in Justin’s arm suddenly increased. The grin disappeared from his face as he looked at his buddy.

Now Justin was grinning from ear to ear. “You almost had me there…”

Jerome looked at Justin’s biceps which was once again crawling with pulsating veins. He blinked as he couldn’t believe what he saw; did he really see the biceps grow ever so slightly?!

Jerome started to get tired, but he wasn’t ready to give up. He adjusted his seating and started to put some body weight into the game. Without success. Justin pushed Jerome’s arm to the starting position ever so slowly. No matter how much force Jerome applied, he couldn’t get it to stop.

As the two arms reached the starting position again, Justin looked Jerome straight in the eyes. “Are you ready?”

“For what?”

“This!” Justin yelled as he slammed the arm of his buddy to the table. The biceps in his arm exploded in size, ripping his rolled up sleeve apart. “GOT YA!” he yelled from excitement as Jerome quickly pulled away his arm from the table. The last, unexpected, blow had hurt and he tried to shake it off.

Dylan, still sitting at the side, couldn’t believe what his eyes saw. His mouth fell open as he heard Justin’s arm rip open part of his shirt.

“Wow! Bro! What has happened to you!? You’re ripped!” he yelled.

Davy could only smile as he witnessed the hulking power of his big brother. And he knew what unleashed it; he was holding it in his hands.

“I’ve got myself some well-deserved growth spurts, guys!” Justin tried to explain as both Dylan as well as Jerome were mesmerized by his right arm. “Still not afraid of me?” he asked Jerome as he flexed his right arm into an even more impressive peak than before.

“Dude, this is just unbelievable! You can never be bigger than me…that’s impossible…!”

“Wanne measure it?” Justin said filled with self-confident as he positioned his flexed arm in front of Jerome’s face. “Or better yet, why don’t we compare?!”

Jerome didn’t want to, but Justin didn’t let him off the hook that easily. With his left hand he grabbed Jerome’s arm and bent it as if he was flexing. “Come on, work with me, or are you afraid to be humiliated?”

Jerome knew it was the exact same phrase he had used on Justin before the arm-wrestling match, so he couldn’t bail. He flexed his still impressive 15 inch arm next to Justin’s, but as soon as he did, he knew it was no match for the now 16.5 inch pythons of Justin.

Justin could only laugh out loud at the size difference between the two arms. With his free hand he squeezed Jerome’s biceps and asked “Is this all you’ve got?”

Humiliated, Jerome punched Justin in the stomach. It was an old habit they used to do to each other when they had a disagreement. However before when Jerome punched Justin, he felt nothing more than an untrained, flat belly. Now he was punching something hard.

“Dude! What are you hiding under there?!” Jerome said as he lifted up the lower half of Justin’s now extremely tight shirt. “Jesus Christ! That’s what I call an eight-pack!”

Hidden underneath the fabric of the size M t-shirt was a row of abdominals only seen on those fitness commercials. Jerome could clearly count 8 individual abs, which were visible due to his extremely low body fat.

“Dude, take off your shirt!” Jerome insisted.

Justin, now as curious about his body as any other person in the backyard, removed his shirt in a second. What he revealed was the most perfectly chiseled torso in the entire neighborhood; rivaling those of professional male fitness models. His shoulders had widened and his pecs had grown into an impressive set.

“Let me try something…” Justin said as he concentrated. Within seconds, he mastered the famous pec dance; alternating his left and right pec to flex.

“Dude, that’s awesome!”, Jerome said as he inspected his buddy’s body, “What’s your secret?”

12.content:
As Justin played around with the toy gun, the entire family was laughing at the strange gift Frank had just received from his colleague. Little did the family know, except Frank, that he was actually in a secret love affair with the beautiful, voluptuous redhead. He, however, had no idea what the toy gun could do and what it meant. Even the small note attached to the gift didn’t make sense to him.

“It will fix your problems and make you irresistible”

These words kept crossing through Frank’s mind as he tried to find a solution to the mysterious riddle. What could it mean? What had he discussed with her that this little device could fix, and why would it make him irresistible?

Meanwhile, at the other side of the table, Debby could also think of only one thing herself: who was Vanessa and why did she send over a gift to her husband? And why “Love, Vanessa”? Are they seeing each other? Is Frank cheating on me with the tramp from the office? Or is it something less serious. She wanted answers!

As both parents were trapped in their own mind puzzles, neither noticed the blue beam being shot out from the gun in his or her direction. Nor did they notice they were engulfed in a blue haze for several milliseconds.

Just as Justin, from the shock, dropped the gun on the concrete tiled floor, they came back to reality.
12.title: One of his parents

choices: The twins push Frank to test his strength
The next day, Frank has to go to work where he meets Vanessa, he takes the gun
Frank hid the gun, but someone finds and uses it
121.content:
“Oh my god, dad! Are you OK?” Justin panicked as he had just shot his own dad with an unknown ray gun.

“Honey, how are you feeling?” his concerned wife asked sitting at the opposite end of the table.

“I-I feel fine…I think….” Frank said as he shifted his weight in the chair. “What happened?”

“It was an accident, I swear!” Justin said, still a bit in shock. “I didn’t mean to…”

“Hey, son, take it easy! It’s OK, I feel fine!” Frank lied as he did feel a strange sensation in his stomach. “Just tell me what you did?”

“I…I shot you…with this?” Justin said as he handed over the gun to his father.

Frank inspected the device with great attention. It did look like a gun a toy shop would sell, a bit like a 1950s space zapper. “And what happened next?”

“A blue beam shot out the front and hit you in the chest. You were radiating blue as well for a second!” Davy yelled a little bit too excited. He could see this entire thing form into one of his comic book stories.

Frank laughed. “Well, there is no need to worry guys, I feel absolutely fine! I’m sure this is only a prank a colleague likes to play on me, and the thing is absolutely harmless…” Frank stood up. “Let me, just to be safe, put this at a safe place.”

As soon as Frank disappeared into the house, the rumors started spreading. “What do you think it did?” “It didn’t kill him, so I think he’s right, it might just be a prank” “But why did he glow blue?” “And who is Vanessa?”

Not long after, Frank returned. He was wearing a dark and light grey striped polo with a pair of jeans. Due to his length, he always had to wear size M shirts, even though they were too wide for his upper body. Also his skinny arms would not at all fill the wide sleeves of his shirts.

The strange sensation in his stomach had not gone away, in fact it had increased. Yet he was not alarmed by it. As he stepped outside to join his family again, he lifted his arm to scratch an itch at the back of his head.

“Wow mr. Smith, nice pipes if I may say so!” Jerome said as he was the first one to notice the increased size of Frank’s upper arms.

“Huh? What?” Franks responded, not entirely sure what Jerome meant.

“Your arms! They are quite impressive! I never knew they were this big. Have you been working out?” Jerome explained.

Frank looked down at his upper arm and could not believe what he saw. His arm was a lot thicker than he could remember. Also the veins in his arms were clearly visible, pumping heavily with every heartbeat. Out of curiosity he flexed one of his arms a little, and to his surprise the biceps responded by growing into a decent peak. “Oh my god!”

He started breathing more rapidly, both from excitement as well as from the increased tingling in his stomach. The feel spread to his chest; a nasty sting in his heart area caused Frank to collapse to the ground. He landed on all fours, screaming from pain. The entire family went into shock and disbelieve.

Justin, his oldest son, immediately ran to his father and asked if he needed any help, if he was feeling alright.

Frank couldn’t answer. He started hyperventilating as the feeling in his chest increased. He started having trouble breathing as the collar of his polo was getting tighter around his neck. It wasn’t his polo which shrank; however, it was his neck which expanded. Still on all fours he took one hand and yanked the collar open. He let out a loud sigh of relieve.

Justin, now positioned on his knees next to his dad, was terrified. It was almost as if his dad was having a seizure; he was unresponsive to their questions and he had a vague look in his eyes. The biceps in Frank’s upper arm grew even larger as he applied pressure to yank the collar open. Justin had a front row seat and was both scared as well as impressed with his dad’s muscles. He put one hand on his dad’s back, which oscillated up and down rapidly from every breathe he took, and felt a strange movement under the fabric of his dad’s polo.

“Dad! Speak to me! Are you OK?”

He didn’t reply. The rest of the family looked on in awe. Debby stopped the twins from getting closer and comforted Amber as she thought her dad was dying.

Justin’s arm felt his dad’s back expand, it grew. The fabric of his polo was getting tighter and tighter, just until it couldn’t hold the pressure anymore. Then it ripped.

A clear rip down the entire length of his polo opened up Frank’s back for his family to see. Justin’s hand now touched his dad’s naked skin; it felt rock-hard. All the muscles underneath his skin were pulsating and expanding. He tried to calm his dad, who was still in a lot of pain.

Frank’s head hang downwards, facing the ground. He grunted and screamed; the transformation wasn’t painless. His expanding upper torso was supported by his arms, which he held in a 90 degree angle on the ground. In a clear moment he opened his eyes and saw his own biceps blow up to unfamiliar size, his forearms reaching Popeye-esque proportions and veins crawling all over his skin.

Not only his upper body was growing, also his legs were expanding in size. The jeans he was wearing were soon too tight and starting ripping at the seams much like his polo. Tree trunks of thighs and blown-up calves could now fully support the grown upper body.

After a minute or two, the tingling sensation went away and the growing stopped. The grunts and screams also stopped. Justin once again padded his dad’s now enormous back and asked if his dad was feeling alright.

Still no answer.

Next to Justin was now the biggest man he had ever seen; completely ripped out of his clothes. All he was wearing was a pair of torn down jeans and pieces of fabric that used to be his polo. His head was still facing down. Justin felt his dad’s back rise and lower as he slowly got back his breathing rhythm.

“Frank…Honey?!” his wife asked a bit nervously.

Then his head started to move up. “Yes dear…?” a dark baritone voice responded.

“Oh my god! You’re OK!” Debby yelled from excitement.

“How are you feeling, dad?” Justin asked as he helped his father get up. He hooked his arms under his dad’s armpit and pulled him up. He couldn’t believe how large his upper arms and shoulders were now.

“I’m…I don’t know…I’m feeling alright, I think…” Frank said as he stretched his arms out and pushed his upper body backwards. He was now sitting on his knees, facing his son for the first time. His torso was still covered in rags of his polo, but with one simple tear he ripped them off completely exposing his chest and eight-pack for everyone to see.

Oohs and aahs of awe and admiration filled the garden.

“Oh my god dad; you’re as ripped as Superman!” Davy yelled excited.

“Wow, I have the strongest dad in the world!” Dylan added.

“Oh honey…” his wife remarked with lust in her eyes.

“Dang mr. Smith, looking good!” Jerome commented.

All these comments made Frank cheer up. He was still sitting on the ground as he wasn’t completely used to his new physique. It felt heavy, yet light at the same time. He felt so strong that his body must be able to support his new size easily, but he had difficulties adjusting to his new strength.

His twins decided to approach their new muscular father. He had ripped off every piece of fabric and was now sitting shirtless on his knees. His chest was filled with a lightly grey patch of chest hair. Dylan decided to take the gamble and reached out his hand to touch his father’s pectoral. He pushed down on the soft, fleshy muscle. Frank looked down and grinned. He moved his arm, unknowingly flexing his chest as a result, causing his pec to turn rock hard. Dylan’s impressed finger bounced back. He could not dent it anymore. His mouth fell open as he touched the now flexed chest muscle.

“Holy shit!” Dylan exclaimed.

Frank laughed. “That’s nothing, here, look at this!” He lifted both his arms in the air, parallel to the ground, with his lower arms at a 90 degree angle. They looked impressive, even not flexed. He asked his boys to put their hands on his biceps. They were both impressed with the size of his arms, until he decided to flex them. His biceps suddenly jumped up, higher than before, making them peak at an impressive size. The split heads of the biceps were clearly visible through the low percentage body fat skin he was now sporting.

Everybody in the garden, including Frank, was impressed. They all let out a cheer. Frank grew a smile on his face from ear to ear. He was now feeling strong enough, and confident enough of his new size, to stand up completely. He put down his hands as supports and pushed his entire body up. He shifted his legs and placed his feet flat on the ground, followed by stretching them completely. Slowly, but steadily, he rose higher and higher, until he towered over his twins by almost a foot. They looked up in awe.

Frank was always a pretty tall man, yet very skinny for his length. The man that stood before the twins right now was nothing short of amazing. He had the body of a giant Greek god and looked like he possessed Herculean strength. Yet it was the same old dad they grew up with.

Debby approached her husband. With her height she only reached his chest. “Oh honey, you look amazing!” Then she hugged him.

122.content:
All Frank noticed was a bright, light blue, flash, right before his entire vision went dark. As he blinked, his vision slowly returned; first blurry, then it refocused. All the while he heard his family panic.

“Oh my god! Dad! What did I do? I didn’t mean to…” he heard the voice of his oldest son yell.

“Frank! Honey! Please say something…?” his wife yelled and then turning towards her son “What was that?”

“I don’t know?” Justin almost cried.

“Dad! Dad! Wake up!” the twins yelled in unison.

“Mr Smith, are you OK?” Jerome asked.

“Oh look, he’s regaining consciousness…” Amber, his daughter, explained to the group.

As Frank’s vision returned, he couldn’t help but notice a strange, tickling sensation on his chest.

“Dad, are you OK? Did I hurt you?” Justin asked worried.

Frank let out a sigh as he adjusted his seating. “No son, it didn’t hurt a bit…and I’m feeling fine. It’s a bit ticklish, that’s all…” Frank opened the top two buttons of his shirt, exposing the patch of grey chest hair, and rubbed his hand over it. His skin had turned red where the beam had hit his body. “It’s probably nothing, I feel fine…just a little itch!”

Justin, still not entirely overcome by the shock of shooting his own dad with an unknown device, grabbed the gun from the floor and put it back in the box. “Let’s just keep this away from anyone until we find out if it’s dangerous or not…” He went into the garage to store it.

The family, calmed down from the shock as they’ve noticed Frank is alright, finishes dinner. As Debby is in the kitchen making coffee, the rest of the family sits outside, enjoying the nice evening. The sun is setting and it is starting to get dark. Frank turns on the porch lights and Amber lights some garden candles.

“I’d best be heading home” Jerome said as he noticed what time it was.

“Are you sure you don’t want to stay for a cup of coffee?” Frank offered.

“Na, sorry. It’s already getting dark and I don’t want my mom to worry too much”, he confessed, “she hates it when I’m out and about in the dark!”

Once inside the house, Amber ran up to her room, locked the door and let herself fall on her bed. She cried, scared of the strange feeling brewing inside her. What could it be? And why her; why was she the one to get shot by the gun?!?

As she lay on her bed in a fetal position, someone knocked on her door. “Amber, please, open up…”

It was Justin. He was sorry to have shot his little sister and wanted to comfort her.

“I’m really sorry for what I’ve done! I didn’t mean to…it just happened…I’m sorry!”

“GO AWAY!” Amber yelled through her tears.

“But I just want to talk…how are you feeling?!” Justin’s voice on the other side of the door said.

“I don’t want to talk! Just let me alone…please!” she yelled back. The feeling inside her chest was slowly getting fading. Her crying slowly stopped as well.

Outside her door, Justin wanted to knock on her door one more time, but his mother stopped him. “Let her, Justin. Don’t try to make it worse…she’s just scared.”

“But I…” Justin stammered.

“Just go back downstairs, there’s nothing you can do. I’ll go talk to her.”

Justin listened to his mother and went downstairs. Then Debby knocked on Amber’s bedroom door, softly. “Honey, it’s me…can I come in…?”

Amber wiped away the final tear as she felt better than before. The strange feeling had disappeared. She opened the door for her mom to come in.

“Hi honey, how are you feeling?” Debby asked as she followed her daughter and sat next to her on the bed. She grabbed her daughter’s hand. Amber looked up as a tingling sensation went through her arm.

“Fine…it’s just…I was scared…” Amber confessed.

“I understand! We all were. We didn’t know what happened? Or what that strange gun did to you…” her mother said.

“And when everybody was looking at me which such strange expressions on their faces, I just wanted to run…be alone!”

“And you were absolutely right to do so!” Debby said as she let go of her daughter’s hand. She felt a little lightheaded. Amber adjusted her seating, as she felt a bit strange as well. “Thank god you are OK and nothing bad happened!” Debby concluded.

“Yeah…I guess I can consider myself lucky…” Amber said as she massaged her left shoulder which felt a bit stiff.

“Are you ready to go back downstairs? There is someone who wants to apologize to you…” Debby asked her daughter. She rubbed her forehead as she suddenly had a light headache.

Amber looked at her mother. “I’ll be right down…I’m ready! You go ahead!”

Debby looked at her daughter. She grabbed her daughter’s cheek as she gave her a kiss on the forehead. “OK sweety, I’ll get the ice cream ready then!”

As Amber’s mom stood up to go downstairs, she felt really light in her head. She almost fell over, but could gain her balance. “Ohh, sugar rush!”

Amber saw her mother leave her room. As Debby closed the door behind her, Amber rushed to her full length mirror and looked at her face. She felt the same tingling sensation in her cheek as her mother touched her as she had felt when her mother grabbed her hand. Was she seeing things, or did her face look slimmer?

Next, she inspected the rest of her body. Something was different, she knew, but she couldn’t exactly tell what. She lifted up the bottom of her shirt to look at her stomach, and to her surprise it was most definitely slimmer than before. The chubby tummy, which she had inherited from her mother, was reduced into a tight tummy. That was odd; was something up with her? Could the strange gun have done something to her? She felt more energetic as well, what’s up with that?

She decided not to read too much into it and headed downstairs.

Neither of them were anywhere close to him in terms of brawn, of course, but they still should have been able to slam Amber's hand down in less than a second. And they hadn't let her win; he'd seen the stunned, disbelieving expressions on their faces as Amber had defeated them. Now she wanted to arm wrestle him. Then their linked hands came to a stop, about three-quarters of the way down. Jerome redoubled his efforts, only to find he couldn't budge Amber's arm by so much as one more millimeter.

Unable to comprehend what was happening Jerome looked across into Amber's face, searching for signs that she was on the verge of giving in, her unbelievable strength nearing its end. What he saw was exactly the opposite. All signs of strain had left her exquisite features; she looked calm and at ease with the situation, like she could do this for another five hours without breaking a sweat.

Jerome was afraid he wouldn't be able to handle another five minutes! It felt like he was straining against the immovable stone arm of a statue! And he was just so tired, moreso than after any workout he'd had in his life.

A ripping sound made him glance down. To his amazement, he saw that Amber's bulging bicep had torn through her shirt sleeve! It was every bit as big as Priscilla Newton's-no, it was bigger!

Then the impossible happened: his straining, trembling arm started to shift back toward the center of the table.

No! It couldn't be! Jerome dug down into his final reserves, but it changed nothing. Amber kept forcing his arm back, her own very muscular limb steady as a freaking rock. Almost sobbing now he tried to stop her, but he was nearly spent and she was just so STRONG! Stronger than him, stronger than anyone he'd ever met before. He didn't know how that could be, but there was no denying the painful reality of it.

They went past the halfway point and her great bicep wasn't even flexing anymore. This was easy for her now! He could tell by the sexy, superior smile she was shooting him!

She slammed his hand to the pine table so hard that he was genuinely afraid she might have broken it. He wanted to examine it to see, but humiliatingly she hadn't released him, and he knew better now than to think he could break the grip of this raven-haired Amazon.

"Winner and supreme champion, Amber Smith!" Davy declared excitedly. Stranding up Amber let him go and hit a magnificent, breathtaking double biceps pose, shredding her remaining sleeve in the process. Jerome stared helplessly up at the most built and beautiful girl he'd ever had the privilege of laying eyes on.

135111.content:
Amber luxuriated in the astonished gaze of her little brother and the lustful gaze of Jerome. As she relaxed from her imposing flex Jerome stuttered out a request.

"S-so, Amber, what are you doing tomorrow?"

This was it! Jerome, the boy she'd mooned over for years, was finally asking her on a date! To her own shock she found that the prospect of going out with him had ceased to interest her. Yes, he was still handsome and charming, but the muscles which had practically made her drool were no longer as impressive as they once were; in fact they weren't nearly as impressive as her's! Her arms were visibly thicker than his and obviously far stronger. Through her amazing new siphoning ability she had taken for herself much of the raw physical power which had attracted her to Jerome in the first place. In fact if she had wanted to, she could probably literally crush her old crush now! This realization excited Amber in a way she had never been before and suddenly the elusive draw of sports became clear to her. It was all about demonstrating your physical prowess, proving your superiority over the other participants. It was about showing you were a winner-which the new Amber Douglas was through and through!

And she didn't need a loser like Jerome dragging her down.

"Sorry, Jerome," she said sweetly. "I'm washing my hair."

Barely restraining a laugh at his expression of hurt rejection Amber turned her back on him and went back into the house, running up the stairs three at a time to reach her room. There she stripped and began examining her radically changed form. All of the fat she'd so hated was gone, but she wasn't too skinny. No, her sculpted, very large muscles made her positively voluptous. For a second she frowned, wondering if perhaps some boys might find her too buff. She shrugged her broad shoulders resignedly. If so, it was their loss. Besides, she wouldn't give this up if she could. It felt wonderful to be so strong! Turning she put one hand underneath her bed and effortlessly lifted it up almost to the ceiling! Grinning Amber lowered her bed back to the ground and moved over to her closet. Her old clothes were no longer suited to her, but she put on her shortest skirt and cutest top before slipping on a pair of sandals. No, she would never surrender what she had gained. If anything, she wanted more!

And she knew exactly where to get it.

Joe Daniels was just finishing dinner when the doorbell rang. He went into his foyer and swung the door open, expecting maybe a Girl Scout selling cookies or a lawn service rep. He was unprepared for the vision waiting on his porch.

She was six inches shorter than him, with long, lusterous black hair. She had the face of a super-model, and the body of a female Olympic athlete. Through her stance and body language she radiated an aura of utter confidence and self-assurance. Clearly this was a woman who knew what she wanted and how to get it.

"Can I help you?" Joe asked, thrown a bit off his stride.

"Yes," she purred. "You can." She wrapped an arm around his neck, pulled his head down and kissed him!

Shock prevented Joe from resisting intiallly. It wasn't that he objected to making out with beautiful women, quite the contrary. This was too forward even for him though! He didn't know this woman from Eve, and she sure wasn't acting very stable. Joe had an active enough social life without having to date kooks. Lots of women wanted him, from high shcool girls to women his own age to dowdy middle-aged wives like Mrs. Douglas from across the street.

When she wrapped her arms around his shoulders Joe was finally able to regain control of himself. The tired feeling which had suddenly come over him and the heat of the kiss tempted him to simply go with the flow, but that would be dangerous. She could have a disease, and if they went all the way he was sure to drop off to sleep afterwards given the way he felt at the moment. The last thing he wanted was to give this crazy chick free reign in his house while he was unconscious.

So Joe gently pushed at her shoulders, noting how wide and thick they were for a woman. There was no effect, other than to make her break the kiss and began a new one.

"Stop!" he tried to say, but she ignored him. She was a good kisser, he'd give her that, but this had gone far enough. He tried to break out of her embrace-and couldn't! He tried again, throwing chivalry to the wind and using all of his brawn. Nothing! Geez, her ams were like freaking steel! How strong was she anyway?

Like in a nightmare Joe's increasingly frantic struggles met with no success. In fact her hold was tightening painfully. I'm going to have bruises tomorrow, Joe thought in wondering disbelief. From a WOMAN! It was impossible!

As a last restort Joe shut his mouth and turned his head, hoping that if he refued to give her what she wanted she would let him go. Instead she continued to hold him and the exhaustion he'd been fighting became even more prounounced.

"I tried to make this fun for both of us," she whispered seductively to him.

"Let me go!" he insisted, still hardly able to believe that a female could restrain him so easily.

"In a minute," she promised.

His head swimming he sagged in her arms, but she supported his two hundred and ten pounds without even seeming to notice. Looking down at himself Joe saw the fantastic body he'd worked so hard to build disappearing before his horrified eyes. His pecs, biceps, triceps-everything was getting smaller, less developed and less defined. At the same time the mysterous woman's muscles seemed to be swelling up right along with her strength! Her bear-hug would have a real bear howling for mercy, but all Jim could do was whimper.

"You're hurting me!" he pleaded.

"Shh, shhh," she said soothingly. "It's almost over."

At last she released him and Jim slumped to his foyer floor. His last thought before the darkness enfolded him was to hope that this was indeed a nightmare and that he' would awaken safe and sound in his bed.

Amber sighed in pleasure and stretched, throughly enjoying the weight and size of her massive new muscles. Though her height hadn't changed, she felt like a titaness! She knew she had grown more than strong enough to pulverize anyone who got in her way. Leaving Joe lying on his foyer floor the gorgeous, muscle-bound goddess walked back across the street to her house. It was time she made a few changes to the family hierarchy. . .

1351111.content:
Amber strolled in the back door as dusk slowly turning to night. She glanced into the family room and saw Justin and Jerome. She knew her parents would be in their room. Slinking upstairs quietly, Amber walked into the sewing room. She smiled finding one of her mother’s old bikini tops. It would have been much too big for Amber just this morning, but now it was likely too small! Fashioning some thick stretchable string to the top, Amber changed into the bikini top. She pulled off her skirt and finding the matching bikini bottom, quickly pulled it on. It was time to make her presence known! Kicking off her sandals, Amber smiled wickedly as she sauntered toward the twin’s room. Dylan and Davy Smith were in the room playing a football video game. Davy looked over at Dylan in between plays.

“I still can’t believe what happened outside today. Amber totally kicked ass.”

Dylan grunted, still unhappy about the events. “She just got lucky, that’s all.”

Amber pushed the door open roughly and it hit the stop with a thud. The boys both turned to see Amber standing there with a nasty grin on her unbelievably beautiful face.

“Oh really? Do these look like the arms of someone who got lucky?”

Amber placed her dainty right foot forward and flexed her leg, bulging out a massive calf and a ferocious set of monster deeply separated quads thicker than any the boys had ever seen. Each slab of her mighty quad appeared bigger than Davy’s entire leg! The lower thigh tear-dropped over her small knee to the point of nearly covering it! The giant thigh swept up into a narrow midsection peppered with incredible pebble obliques and tectonic plates of steel abdominals broken into ten bricks of she-muscle. The muscle laden mid-section swept up into a nearly four foot wide set of killer lats and a massive set of pectorals that built up a six inch shelf of angry beef that presented her well proportioned breasts forward like twin missiles, stressing the bikini top as the tit flesh was exposed on either side and the bottom. But as the boys bug eyes wandered up to her dominating expression, deep blue eyes and long thick dark hair, they ventured over toward those biceps that had crushed the competition in the arm wrestling arena. Davy had seen her flex her biceps after defeating Jerome and was surprised then. But now he was nearly in shock! Dylan’s jaw dropped open as they saw Amber flex forth the biggest, hardest, most detailed set of arms they had ever seen on anyone, let alone a girl! Her small fists pushed out into wide, thick forearms with rope like muscles and back toward her small elbow joints. Her triceps dipped low and looked like footballs with etched muscle fibers running around the edges. But it was her biceps that caused the boys to sweat, to drool with envy and to feel a pit of fear build in their stomach. Her bicep blasted up over her crazy thick muscle laden shoulders and rode half way up her forearms and were so thick that they pushed her forearms back! The ball of muscle pulled her skin taught, showcasing scary detail, deep bicep splits and crystal peaks. Her biceps had to be at least 22 inches around! She released her flex and stalked forward toward her stunned siblings.

“And you two had better realize who’s in charge around here now!”

Amber reached down and grabbed a fist full of shirt of each brother and with barely contained force pulled them up onto their feet and in a scary display of strength, up into the air! Each boy may have been 3 inches taller, but Amber pulled them higher until their feel danged inches above the ground. Dylan grabbed her thick forearm, hoping to get away. But within moments his grip weakened as his strength leached into his big sister and his muscles started to reduce! Davy was gripped with fear at both his helplessness and the fact that his stronger brother was just as helpless and now shrinking before his eyes. Even as Dylan’s head began to loll and his he let go of Amber’s arm, his hands were still touching and his muscles reduced down until they were the same size as Davy’s! Amber looked at Dylan and then Davy.

“You two wimps had better get it through your thick skulls that my word is law from now on. If you want to stay healthy you’d better do what I say. Is that clear?”

Davy nodded vigorously, about ready to pee his pants. Dylan barely got out a weak nod, knowing he had better toe the line. Sniffing, Amber pulled them close and then launched them toward opposite walls where they crashed harshly and fell onto their beds. Amber smiled menacingly. “Good then. Now go to sleep!”

She turned and hit the lights as she moved out of the room and toward her parents. Debby looked up from her book when she heard the loud crash coming from the twin’s room and then over at Frank.

“Frank, perhaps you should go tell the twins to calm down.”

Frank grumbled when their bedroom door flew open. There stood Amber in all her muscle glory, proud and belligerent.

“Mom, I need you to sew me an outfit for tomorrow. As you can see, I’ve outgrown my clothes!”

Debby’s eyes widened with shock and fear. Amber had never sounded so commanding. But worse than that, she was covered front head to toe with intimidating, pounding muscles! Frank, taken aback by his daughter’s physique, was still not prepared to settle for her tone.

“Amber, I’ll not have you talk to mother like that!”

Amber smiled cruelly. “Oh really?”

She quickly stalked over to her father as he pulled his legs forward to get out of bed. Amber bulled next to him, pushing him back down with her thunderous chest. He grunted as his face turned red with anger and got back up quickly, pushing against her football sized shoulders. Amber didn’t move an inch as her father pushed uselessly against her vastly superior strength. And worse yet, Frank’s anger induced strength quickly waned as Amber pulled his strength and muscles into her body. She smirked as her mother looked on with horror. Amber pulled her arm back and with a loud whoosh, punched her father in the stomach so hard that she lifted him off the ground. Pulling her small fist back, Frank immediately collapsed in front of her and fell onto the ground gagging and gasping for breath.

“I won’t be taking any more advice from you old man.”

Amber looked back at her mother whose face was turning white. “And as for you, I gave you an order. I expect them to be followed without question from now on!”

Debby’s eyes filled with tears and she quickly got up, looked down at her injured husband, whimpered, and headed out the door.

Turning out of the room, Amber headed downstairs to complete her trifecta of domination. And what better way to finish up than the two college boys that she humiliated hours before. Walking into the family room Amber snuck up on Justine and Jerome. They were both on the sectional with the recliners out. Amber reached under the couch and began to lift the sectional and both boys up into the air with ridiculous ease. Amber’s body tingled with excitement as her incredible strength turned her on. The boys yelped out from surprise as they moved high in the air. Amber let out a small girlish grunt as she pushed the couch and boys over her head!

“Hello boys. Miss me?”

Both boys went cold and silent. Amber was back and she was demonstrating strength that far exceeded either of theirs. Hell, she was likely stronger than both of them together! With a firm grip now on the frame, Amber tilted the sectional forward harshly, sending both boys to the ground with twin thuds. Amber smiled dominantly at the surprised boys who looked up at her mega muscle form with fear. Thoroughly enjoying their scared expressions, Amber dumped the couch behind her with a crash. She placed her fists on her hips in a classic superhero pose and flexed the most intimidating mound of muscles and curves either boy had ever imagined. Amber chuckled.

“Anyone want to arm wrestle?”

Both boys, stunned beyond belief, stammered. Amber sniffed.

“Didn’t think so. You could use both of your arms against one of mine and still wouldn’t have a chance. I own you two. I could destroy both of you right now if I wanted.”

The boys cowered, unable to even think straight. Amber brought her right arm up and scratched the side of her head, pretending to think things through. Her bicep bunched into a massive ball that only caused the boys more dread.

“You know, perhaps you need a demonstration of my overwhelming strength and power.”

The boys both shook their heads as Justine coughed out a terrified response.

“No, no Amber. We know who’s stronger.”

Amber looked down unconvinced. “I’m not so sure you’re just saying that. However, I’ll let you go tonight. But cross me once and it’s go time! Got it?”

Both boys nodded vigorously, happy that Amber was letting them off the hook. Jerome scrambled up and ran for the front door, escaping into the night. Justine crawled toward the stairs as Amber stood in the same spot and watched him like a supervisor in a sweat shop. Once he reached the bottom of the stairs he ran to the top and into his room. Amber nodded her head with satisfaction.

Walking over to a chair, Amber picked up the remote and smiled as she heard the sewing machine hum upstairs and smiled. Yeah, she thought. Tomorrow is going to be a good day!

13511111.content:
And for her, it was indeed a good day! Amber caused an sensation when she showed up at school; no one could believe that this sculpted, muscle-bound beauty was the same plain, chubby girl they'd all known. She was the absolute center of attention wherever she went and she reveled in it!

There were some nasty comments, a few right to her face, but the newly proud and aggressive Amber didn't hesitate to answer such insults with her fists. More than one student found themselves slumped over and vomiting that day, terrified they would die from the tremendous blow to their midsection. Amber took care not to do this in front of any of the adults and none of the other kids ratted on her, including her victims; those not entranced by her loveliness were too frightened by her displays of strength to risk crossing her.

At home Amber continued to assert her absolute supremacy as the head of the household. Figuratively speaking, the rest of the family were now no more than slaves to Empress Amber. Even Frank and Debby were forced to obey their mighty middle child without question; the slightest defiance of Amber's will was met with swift and painful punishment. On the second day she had snapped her father's right arm in two like a twig when he'd dared to question her, an event which had led the already cowed rest of the family to wholly submit to Amber's authority.

And so the previously overlooked Amber got the best of everything: tons of CD's, a closetful of expensive clothes to flaunt the splendor and glory of her amazing, power-packed physique, and even a brand-new Ferrari! As Amber herself had observed, a muscle girl deserves a muscle car.

Over the next couple of months Amber solidfied her hold on the school, becoming by far the most feared and admired person ever to attend the educational institution. This actually frustrated her somewhat, as she missed being able to violently demonstrate her vast physical superiority. The growth spurt which shot her up to almost six feet tall was welcome, but insufficient compensation for the loss of opportunities to exhibit her physical prowess.

The answer came one day when she saw Justin reading a Sports Ilustrated magazine with some football player on the cover. She snatched it away from him and he meekly made no protest. Football! Why not? She was much stronger and better built than any boy on the team; why shouldn't she join? It would be a lot of fun to show those big oafs just what an alpha girl could do.

She ordered Justin to teach her eveything she knew about football and also brought in Jerome and Brett Michaels to help. Though she no longer bothered to give her former friend Bittney even the time of day, Brittney's big brother remained utterly smitten with the Amazonian Aphrodite Amber had become. He jumped at the chance to spend time with her, a decision he found cause to regret when they began practicing football for real. Amber's ripped, enormous muscles were like solid steel! When she slammed into him it was like getting hit by a freight train and he had great difficulty bringing her down when it was his turn to tackle. And she never seemed to get tired, just stronger and more energetic! Though he didn't want to admit it, she soon became an even better football player than he was.

Finally he could no longer deny reality when he suffered a spained shoulder from a particularly brutal tackle of Amber's. That's when she knew she was ready to join the team.

At first Coach Thompson tried to dissuade Amber, but the gorgeous muscle-goddess wasn't about to take "no" for an answer. A practice skirmish with the team saw Amber annihilate the opposition and by the next week she was the Varsity team's starting quarterback. Two victorious games later Amber was elected team captain and soon enthusiastic fans bestowed upon her the nickname, "Iron Maiden".

While Amber reached ever greater heights of glory, her family tried to go on existing in her vast shadow. Frank actually seemed to have shrunk. He had been essentially unmanned by his dominant daughter and scurried about doing whatever she imperiously commanded. Debbie was equally obedient, seemingly resigned to serving her physically perfect paragon of a child.

Justin was eaten up with envy, seeing his younger sister so easily achieve his own dreams of football glory. It didn't help that his best friend was so obviously attracted to Amber, in spite of the contemptous way she continued to treat Jerome.

Davy had apapted to the situation perhaps best of all. He stayed in his room whenever he could, unless Amber had assigned him a task, in which case he completed it quickly and competently. He not only quite logically feared Amber, but also understood that his twin brother could no longer protect him at school; he was entirely dependent on his super-stud sister's massive muscles to keep him safe from bullies.

If Davy was handling the situation best of all, Dylan was doing the worst. He'd been cut from the gymnastics team and was no longer friends with Vlad; he'd taken a swing at the other boy when Vlad wanted Dylan to arrange a date with Amber. Each day as was an agony for Dylan, because he'd lost of what had made him special, the athletic ability he'd taken pride in his whole life. He couldn't stand being as scrawny as Davy, especially since he didn't have his brother's intellectual acumen to fall back on.

The breaking point for the fifteen year-old came three months after Amber's transformation. He'd neglected to do her laundry because he'd been working out. Ever since his diminishment Dylan had been working like a maniac trying to build himself up; it was the only thing which gave him hope and he was finally starting to see some progress. He wasn't back to his old self yet, but he was getting there.

When Amber found he hadn't done his job, though, she'd utterly thrashed him and as an encore had ordered him to kiss her dainty right foot. As his lips touched Amber's fair skin he felt the gains he had made leave him, all of his hours of hard work only serving to further strengthen his already already immensely muscular and spectacularly strong sister! He had actually broken down crying and she had left him there with a musical laugh.

The following Wedneday he ditched school two hours early and headed for home. Mom would be out shopping and he'd have the house to himself. He was determined to rip Amber's room apart until he found the gun which had made her into such a titaness. He knew what she'd do to him if she caught him, but the terror wasn't enough to hold him back; he couldn't live like this anymore!
