Amber got up from the table and ran inside the house, passing her mother. Debby was feeling better than just a few moments ago as she had rested for a short while. She didn’t know what happened to her when she suddenly felt dizzy, but everything was back to normal now. As she noticed her daughter running passed her, she couldn’t help but yell to her to finish her dessert before leaving the table. It was of no use, Debby was already upstairs.

Debby went into the bathroom and locked the door. She was excited, yet scared, after she felt her arm through the fabric of her shirt. She slowly rolled up her sleeve, which was more difficult than she remembered, and couldn’t believe what she saw; a nicely defined upper arm with little to no body fat. As she held it in front of her, stretched, she felt the hardness of her flexed triceps. Then she bent her arm, causing her biceps to spring into action. It grew bigger than she remembered it being; almost as if she had started lifting weights. It was a clearly defined biceps, almost looking bigger than Justin’s arms from what she remembered.

“Oh my god!”

She grabbed her flexed biceps with her other hand and felt it all over. The feeling was incredible; she felt like she had doubled her strength and could take on the world now.

Next she lifted her shirt, exposing her stomach in the reflection. As she now expected, her stomach was perfectly flat with a faint hint of trained abs visible through her skin. She made a fist with her hand, flexed her stomach and pounded it several times. She like the sound of her fist hitting her hard stomach as she couldn’t believe how happy she was with her recent changes.

Amber took off her shirt completely. Her upper body was much more fit than before; she could even swear her shoulders were slightly wider. Amber looked at her breasts in her reflection. They had always been nice B-cup size breasts, looking perfectly in proportion to the rest of her body. She cupped one of her breasts with her hand as she could swear they looked slightly bigger, filling her bra a little bit more. As she moved her right arm, she noticed her right breast move ever so gently. It perked up. She moved her arm back; her breast lowered back. She continued repeating this motion until she finally figured out that her chest muscles underneath her breasts were beginning to get developed; causing her breast to jump up. It was only the slightest movement, but it felt incredible to Amber. She practiced a little more, until she figured out how to breast dance them; alternating each breast to perk up after one another.

She felt great. She looked around the bathroom for something heavy as she had the sudden urge to lift something. She couldn’t find anything heavy, so she left the bathroom and went into her own room. “Me neither…!” Davy added, turning his head to face Justin.

“Oh thank god! So I missed!”, Justin sighed relieved, “I wasn’t sure if I had hurt one of you guys…thank god you’re OK!”

“Well, lucky us…”, Davy yelled somewhat shocked, “…could you also explain to us WHAT you shot us with?!?”

His brother joined in. “Yeah! And WHY you shot at us with an unknown device in the first place…? A bit trigger-happy, now are you?”

“Now, now, there’s no reason to get angry all of a sudden…” Frank, the dad, joined in to calm the twins’ senses.

Justin didn’t know how to respond as he looked back down at the gun in his hands. “I…I really didn’t mean to hurt you…I just…”

“You just WHAT?!?” Dylan yelled somewhat furious as it dawned on him what his big brother had just done. He stood up from his chair and walked over to his big brother. They were both the same height, so they saw eye to eye. “Care to explain yourself a bit more…” Dylan said as he gave his big brother a push. Justin fell backwards, quickly adjusting his stance as not to fall completely. Even though he was the older brother, he lacked the size. His little brother was bigger due to his gymnastics; he could easily push his big brother down. This was why Justin always tried to avoid conflicts with his little brothers.

As Justin wanted to shove Dylan back, Frank stood up and separated the boys. Davy quickly gathered behind his twin brother, which he always did as they were in a fight. His saw his brother as his protector.

“Boys, BOYS!” Frank yelled to calm down the boys of his family. “Now there is absolutely no reason to fight each other. Dylan…it was just an accident, and Justin…please nicely apologize to your brother!”

Both Dylan and Justin looked at their father. Even though he was skinny in size, he made up for it in height and authority. He still towered over his sons and he knew how to take advantage out of that.

“We all can be lucky he missed and nothing serious happened…” Frank added.

“…he didn’t necessarily…miss!” Davy finished.
14.title: The growing twins

choices: Davy is still mad at Justin for shooting him
Davy towers over everybody and wants to test his strength
Someone is so jealous, he or she grabs the gun and shoots
141.content:
“He didn’t necessarily miss?!?”, Frank repeated after his son, “What the hell is that supposed to mean?!?”

Frank was still in between Justin and Dylan, his hands on their chests separating them from each other. Jerome had added himself behind Justin, while Davy stood behind Dylan. All eyes were now focused on him.

“Well, what it literally says; he didn’t miss…” Davy explained.

“So you’re telling me….I really did hit one of you?!?” Justin filled in. He looked at Dylan, who looked just as questioning at Davy. Then he looked at Davy, who nodded. “Oh my god! I hit you!?!”

Dylan looked at his twin brother in disbelief. “He did?!?”

“Yeah, you hit me!”, Davy explained to his big brother, “and it didn’t feel nice! In fact, it hurt like hell! It still does!” His expression changed to an angrier look. He was not at all happy with what his brother had done.

“Oh shit…”, Frank intervened, “…what are you feeling? Where does it hurt? Do you want me to call a doctor?”

“No! No doctor! It feels…strange. It’s burning, all over my body. I don’t know what it is…in a way I kind of like it…I guess…”

Then, suddenly, he grabbed his stomach with both hands as he hunched forward. He let out a scream as a sharp pain in his stomach took over his body. He lowered himself to his knees. His twin brother lowered himself next to him, in fear of what was happening to his brother.

“Davy!!!” Dylan screamed “Are you OK? Speak to me!”

He placed his hands on Dylan’s back, which was now the only thing facing the family. As he touched his brother’s back, he could feel something moving underneath the fabric. Davy let out a cry of pain, as Dylan saw his brother’s back widen. It grew.

“Oh my god…is he…is he…?” Justin yelled in surprise.

The fabric of Davy’s t-shirt began to get tighter and tighter, until suddenly, a large tear ripped open the entire back of his shirt, exposing his growing back muscles underneath.

Dylan looked up at Justin. “Yep…it seems like he is growing!”

Davy’s back and shoulders widened as he lats and traps grew larger. The little m-sized shirt could not contain the growing muscles anymore, ripping open at every seam and more. Not only his back was growing, also his arms were filling up with well-deserved muscle. His triceps formed a perfect horse-shoe, while his biceps balled up into extremely large peaks. His growing bull-neck stretched the collar of his shirt to its extremes. It almost suffocated him, which is why he managed to pull it off in one simple tear. The strength in his arms was doubling, tripling, quadrupling in mere seconds.

Not only his upper body was slowly growing, also his legs were ballooning up to epic proportions. His board shorts started ripping at the seams from his growing thighs and glutes. Powerful tree trunk legs replaced the milky white sticks that used to support his full body weight.

Davy was screaming, crying and grunting from pain, but somehow in his screams there was also a sign of pleasure and satisfaction.

As his transformation came to the same sudden halt as it had begun, the 15-year-old muscle behemoth was sitting on all fours on the concrete floor. His twin brother was sitting beside him, getting him through the painful transformation. He was in just as much awe as the rest of the family. Not only that, there was also a very strong sense of sibling jealousy; but for now Dylan decided to support his brother through this painful thing.

“Hey bro…how are you feeling? Is the strange burning sensation gone? It looks like your transformation has stopped…” Dylan asked slowly as he placed his hand once again on his twin brother’s back. Only this time it felt rock-hard, packed with rippling muscles.

A dark laughter came from Davy’s head. He slowly but steadily pushed himself back up. As he sat straight up on the floor, his upper body completely shredded through his t-shirt, next to his brother he couldn’t do more than smile. A grin from ear to ear appeared on his face as he slowly began to inspect his own, newfound, physique. “Oh My Fricking God!” his dark voice boomed as he felt and flexed every muscle in his torso.

He raised his arm, flexed it, felt his biceps, straightened his arm, felt his triceps…then he continued down to his chest, he flexed it, he held his fingers in between the crevices of his pecs, he ran them over his abs, his obliques, he flared out his lats, he ran his hands over his rippling thighs and finally he looked up at his brother.

“Dude!”, his booming voice said, “I feel super!”
141.title: SuperDavy

choices: Success; Justin grows massive and is saved
She misses; she hits Davy who starts growing again
She misses and shoots someone else entirely
1411.content:
Everyone in the family looked at the muscular teen sitting on his knees on the ground. His massive torso was draped with some last shreds of t-shirt. The big smile on his face revealed his blinking white teeth, as he showed his twin brother with his upper body could do now. His larger than baseball-sized upper arms, his square chest muscles, his rippling eight-pack; he had become an impressive specimen. If you would have been told he was a Mister Olympia, you would have believed it.

Dylan, his twin brother, looked on in amazement. He was a little bit scared at first, but he knew his brother wouldn’t hurt him. As Davy proposed to Dylan to touch his biceps, the twin happily obliged. Feeling the huge, rock-hard muscle in his upper arms made Dylan send a shiver down his spine.

“Wow bro! It’s rock hard!”

Davy’s smile grew only bigger. He extended his arm towards his twin brother and asked him to help get up. Dylan, not sure if he would be able to give any help, grabbed the enormous hand of his brother by the wrist. He added his other hand as well. Then he started to pull. He couldn’t really get any motion in his brother’s body, but luckily Davy helped himself.

It was the first time for Davy to use his newly grown legs; his upper body weighed a ton and he wasn’t sure how his legs would react. As he placed his feet on the ground and he pulled himself up on his brother, he felt blood rushing to his thighs. They sprang into action as they had to push up the entire upper body.

As Davy, leaning on Dylan, almost crushing him, extended higher and higher in height, he surpassed every single person in the garden. Finally, as he reached his full height, he was almost 10 inches taller than the biggest person: his dad. He looked like one of the superheroes from his comics; tall, ripped and powerful. Everyone in the garden let out “oohs” and “aahs”.

Then, all of a sudden, his expression changed. He felt strong, confident and invulnerable. He was no longer the smallest person of the family; he didn’t have to listen to anyone of them anymore; he was finally grown up and strong enough to be the one with the power. This made him realize that he didn’t have to hide behind his twin brother anymore when they got in a fight, like just before. He was now able to pick his own fights! And he already had the first victim in mind: Justin!

Justin, impressed with what happened to his little brother, was happy the entire fight from before did not go through. He looked on in awe as his little brother outgrew him in both height and strength. He was positioned behind the massive Davy as he inspected his own body. Justin had the perfect view of his rippling back. Little did he know that Davy’s expression suddenly changed from the broad smile into something darker; he was out for revenge.

Justin saw the muscles in Davy’s back ripple and flex as he slowly twisted his torso. The behemoth was looking across the garden, almost as if he was finding someone. When his stare crossed Justin’s, Justin knew from the mean look on Davy’s face that he was in trouble.

“You!” Davy’s dark voice boomed as he grabbed his big brother by his collar and hoisted him into the air, only with one hand. Justin gulped. “You did this to me?! You made me this FREAK!”

Jerome and Frank both sprang into action as they wanted to save Justin; they knew Davy could kill him in an instant if he wanted to. However when both men came close, Davy’s free hand swung round, sending the guys through the air to land several feet away. It would be difficult to stop him.

Justin, still hanging in the air face-to-face with his big little brother, didn’t know how to respond. “Why did you shoot me? You didn’t know what the gun could do! It could have killed me!” Davy yelled in his face, getting angrier by the minute. He let Justin back on the ground, only to twist his entire body around to grab him in a headlock. “You know, it only takes a slight flex to crack your neck…”

“You wouldn’t do that…!” Justin cried as he felt the rock hard warm muscle of his brother’s arm around his neck. “I’m your brother…”

“You tried to kill me as well!”, Davy replied, “So why do you think I wouldn’t do the same to you…?”

“I didn’t! It was an accident…I swear!” Justin cried harder as he was frightened to death. He really didn’t know if his brother was serious or playing a game with him.

In the mean time, the rest of the family knew they couldn’t do much, but they had to stop Davy. He was too big and too strong, Justin didn’t stand a chance. That’s when Amber came up with an idea; why don’t we give him an equal opponent?

Amber looked for the box the gun came in and found it on the floor under the table. Luckily, the gun was still inside. She grabbed it, aimed it at Justin and shot!
1411.title: Revenge is sweet

choices: Justin is mad and attacks his brother to wrestle him
Justin is happy with his new size and wants to compare with his brother
14111.content:
Davy, still holding his brother in a head-lock, saw how a blue beam of energy hit his big brother straight in the chest. He let go of his brother’s neck as he followed the source of the beam back towards Amber. Justin fell on the ground, unconscious and out of breath.

“No!!!”, Davy yelled at his sister, “Why did you do that?!?”

Amber, somewhat scared at her hulking brother who came at her, dropped the gun and looked up into her little brother’s eyes. “Be-because you were hurting him!”

“I was only joking!” Davy yelled as he looked at the frightened faces of his family. “You didn’t really think I would have killed him, now did you?”

Nobody said a word.

“Oh my god! I can’t believe you guys! I wouldn’t hurt my own brother! I love what he has done to me! I mean; I was always the weakest of the family and for once in my life that was about to change. I was just messing around, getting back at Justin for all the times he messed me around because of my size; I wasn’t seriously going to kill him!”

Davy looked once more at the frightened faces of his family; still no-one said a single word.

“I can’t believe nobody believes me…” he said as he stared back at his big brother lying motionless on the ground. Then he felt a small hand touching his shoulder. He turned his head to see who it was.

“I believe you…!”

Davy twisted his torso around completely to find his twin brother facing him. He looked so tiny now in comparison.

“You…you do?”

“Sure bro! I’m one hundred percent sure you wouldn’t want to kill any of us…I highly doubt it if you want to kill anyone else for that matter…! You’re a good guy!”

Hearing these words from his twin brother made his heart warm. A smile resurfaced on his face. He draped his arms around his twin’s back and lifted him up into the air.

Dylan felt his brother’s hard muscles from up close as Davy almost squeezed the life out of him. “Bro…easy on the hugs!”

Davy, not knowing his own strength, loosened his grip and apologized. He looked at the rest of his family, who started smiling.

“We’re sorry for giving you the impression we were scared of you!” his mother said as she broke the silence.

“Yeah, we didn’t mean it like that…we’re sure you wouldn’t kill anyone. It’s just; we were a bit startled from your transformation!” Amber added.

“Oh, come here you guys!” Davy said as he spread his arms out for the entire family to give him a hug “You’re the best!”

As they were all laughing and smiling from the hug Davy was giving his family; nobody noticed Justin’s transformation had started. His once motionless body was now shaking and trembling, filling his shirt and shorts with more muscles than they could contain. His body kept adding muscles by the second; stretching his clothes to their limits; until they couldn’t be contained anymore.

Loud ripping sounds filled the silent air of the Smith backyard. Jerome was the first one to notice his best buddy’s transformation. “Uhm…you guys!” he said as he saw Justin’s rippling back muscles through the tears of his shirt.

Everyone else turned their heads to face the growing teenager. Even though mere moments ago they had witnessed the same transformation on the now hulking Davy; it was still an impressive sight to behold. Even Davy, now seeing his own transformation occur right before his eyes, was in awe.

“Does it hurt?” Amber asked Davy as she heard Justin’s groans and screams.

“Yes it does! It feels like a thousand needles punch your skin, followed by all the bones in your body breaking all at once; yet the reward feels so great, so powerful! It’s worth it!” Davy explained as even he looked on with his eyes wide open as Justin’s neck widened to break off his collar.

Justin was slowly regaining consciousness as the transformation was coming to an end. His wide torso had ripped through his shirt completely, leaving mere bits of fabric hanging round his waist. Similarly his thighs had ripped open his shorts; exposing the most powerful tree trunk legs a bodybuilder would be jealous of. The motion in his muscles faded away, leaving the hulked teenager on his hands and knees in front of his family.

Davy was the first, and only, of the family who dared to approach his big brother. He kneeled down next to his brother’s head as he took in his back; it was unbelievably ripped.

“Justin..bro! Are you OK?”
14111.title: Equal opponents

choices: Dylan takes revenge on Justin for carelessness and no one can stop him
Dylan ushers everyone out to the backyard to see his perfect gymnastics routine
Jerome and Davy both lunge for the gun on the table
142.content:
"What do you mean?" Frank asked in sudden concern. "Were you hit, son?"

"No, I wasn't," Davy insisted with a gulp, "but I-I think Dylan was! Look at him!"

All eyes immediately shifted to the blond fifteen year-old. At first no one else saw what Davy, who knew his twin best, had. Standing motionless in his sneakers, work-out shorts and black muscle shirt Dylan appeared completely unchanged; he was the same fit, athletic teeanger he'd been before. His blue eyes had closed and his fists were tightly clenched, making his well-developed biceps and triceps tense and bulge. Her "little" brother's arms looked pretty good, Amber had to admit. In fact . . . they looked even bigger and more defined than Jerome's arms!

"No way!" Justin whispered in awe, staring at the unbelievable sight before him. It was obvious to everyone now that Dylan was changing. His shirt was already skin-tight, outlining a pair of proud, cannonball-sized pecs, and it was beginning to rip across the boy's broadening shoulders. His legs were two tree-trunks of solid muscle and his awesome arms were almost as impressive. Second by second Dylan's burgeoning physique grew steadily more muscular and more powerful.

With the ripping sound of overstressed seams giving way the shirt split in half and fell away, the child's garment no longer appropriate for the He-Man Dylan had become. The entire family and Jerome gaped at the teen's fully revealed, incredible upper body. His tanned chest was very deep and perfectly sculpted, overlooking a carved set of armor-like, eight-pack abs.

Finally the transformation seemed to cease. Opening his eyes Dylan smiled and with a roar flexed his magnificent new biceps, causing everyone to instinctively fall back a step.

"Dylan? Are you all right?" Davy asked timidly. His mega-ripped, muscle-bound brother turned toward him with a fluid, flowing grace that even the lithe and agile adolescent had never displayed before.

"All right?" Dylan asked, his alto voice having deepened into a commanding adult baritone. "I'm better than all right! I've got the body of a GOD now!" he boasted.

None of those assembled could deny Dylan's arrogant claim. He had always been a jock, but now he was built like a gold medal-winning Olympic gymnast.

Frank was completely at a loss as to what say or do. His lover's invention had turned his boy into a true teenage Hercules! He felt utterly overwhelmed just by Dylan's sheer physical presence now. The parental authority he had asserted only a moment ago had withered away in the wake of his son's ascension. Dylan was unquestionably the new man of the house and Frank couldn't even imagine daring to try to tell this dominant alpha male what to do.

Debby, awash though she was in worry and confusion, couldn't help thinking briefly that Dylan was already more than twice the handsome hunk Joe was-and he was only fifteen!

Amber, too, had to fight her instinctive, primal attraction to her golden-haired Adonis of a kid brother. She quickly looked back over at Jerome, but her longtime crush seemed small and scrawny compared to the mass of pure bronzed muscle which was Dylan.

Jerome was making the same comparison. Dylan was the embodiment of all of his muscle dreams come true. He would kill to be half as built as the immensely muscular teen titan.

Justin was terrified! His athlete of a baby bro had been about to kick his butt before, but Dylan looked strong enough to crush him under one foot now!

Davy was trying desperately to process what had happened and get a handle on how he felt. On the one hand, none of the bullies weould ever mess with him again, not with mighty Dylan as his protector. On the other hand, the twins had always been equals in a stange way, Dylan's brawn balanced out by Davy's brains. With the new size and definition of his muscles, though, Davy estimated that Dylan had grown at least five times stronger than he'd been before! Now Davy's intelligence could no longer hope to compare to his twin's near-superhuman physical power. The realization made Davy feel lost and inferior in a way he never had before.
142.title: He had hit athletic Dylan who hulks out to body...

choices: Justin, causing the older brother to grow to as big and strong as Dylan
Himself, creating a massive muscle boy that could rival his powerful twin
Justin, but he missed, hitting Dylan and causing the already huge boy to max out
1421.content:
The grin on Dylan's face sent a shiver down Justin's spine. A minute ago, he had only barely escaped getting beat up by his already-stronger kid brother because of his father's intervention. Now, however, he feared his little brother couldn't be stopped, even if the entire family teamed up against him. Justin gulped, praying that something, anything, would distract Dylan long enough to allow him to escape. But he had no such luck.

"So," Dylan stepped closer to Justin, flexing his arms and chest muscles as he did so, "you think it's cool to just fire strange weapons at your kid brothers without knowing or caring what they'd do. Is that your idea of a good time?"

"'Kid' brother?" Amber chuckled lightly. "I don't think you can really use that term anymore, Dylan! You sure don't look like any kid I've seen."

Dylan spun his head around to look at his sister. "Shut the hell up, Amber, or I'll deal with you next." The fire, anger, and dominance in his eyes shocked Amber, causing her to cower at her brother's intimidating presence. Whatever had caused Dylan's sudden and unexplainable transformation, one thing was for sure: he seemed to be getting way too aggressive and out of control.

Davy watched his newly-huge twin try to intimidate the rest of the family, knowing something was wrong. Dylan might normally be a little intense sometimes, yes, but to snap at his sister like that, to become so belligerent... well, that was way out of his character. Something had happened inside of him as his body had grown and changed, causing him to become more domineering and frightening than any in the family could have possibly feared.

Sneering at Justin, Dylan took another step closer, the stomping of his large foot causing the windows to rattle slightly. "Well, Justin," he finally said, "I think it's time someone decided to give you what you've been deserving for years. I guess that someone's me!!"

He reached out a large hand and grabbed Justin by the neck, lifting him up in the air. Justin's feet dangled freely, several inches off of the ground. His eyes bulged as he gasped for air, clawing wildly but uselessly at Dylan's thick hand, which was wrapped almost completely around his throat. "P-please, Dylan," he begged, his voice wheezing as he struggled to breathe, "I-I'm sorry!!"

"Not as sorry as you're gonna be." Dylan narrowed his eyes and squeezed tighter. Lifting his nineteen-year-old weakling brother into the air like this didn't even make the young teen break a sweat. He even was able to strut around as he held Justin up, his older brother's body swinging and his arms flailing helplessly way as he did so.

"Dylan Timothy Smith!" Frank did his best to make his voice boom, though he heard the slight cracking in it, and he tried to conceal the trembling in his hands as he pointed towards his monster of a son. "Young man, you put your brother down right this instant!"

Dylan only sneered, ignoring his father and thrusting Justin up even higher, his thick arm extended nearly as far as it would go. Jerome would later swear that he heard a dark, menacing laugh coming from somewhere deep inside Dylan at this point, almost as if another being was possessing him, but no one else could confirm this. Whatever the case, there was no denying that Dylan truly was enjoying getting his revenge on his older brother, not just for hitting him with the gun, but for an entire childhood of bullying, teasing, and just being a dick in general.

As the seconds passed, Justin's face began to turn purple, and his eyes started to roll back in their sockets. Sweating profusely, Davy knew that he had to do something to help his older brother survive against this brutal muscle beast, but he didn't know what he could do. His brother needed to be stopped, before someone got seriously hurt... or worse.

Out of the corner of his eye, he spotted the gun, the thing that started this whole mess, lying near Dylan's feet. Justin must have dropped it in all the commotion that occurred since they had gotten hit, while they were trying to figure out what had happened. It almost seemed like something out of one of his comic books, Davy thought. Except that instead of his brother becoming a superhero that would help others with his strength, he had turned into an evil, almost-maniacal villain. If only there was a way to balance out Dylan's strength... Wait! Of course!

His hulk of a brother took Justin's weakening body and slammed it against the wall, forming a large dent in it. The gun now lay behind him, and Davy knew that he only had one chance. Making sure that Dylan was focused on their older brother, Davy quickly ran up, bent over in one smooth motion, and grabbed the gun, dashing back away as quickly as possible. Dylan didn't even notice the movement behind him, too busy strangling the life out of Justin, who seemed to now be unconscious. Davy swallowed hard; it was now or never. He clasped the gun with both hands, attempting to aim it as best as possible. Closing his eyes, he whispered, "Please," and then squeezed the trigger. But who did he aim it at?
1421.title: Power Corrupts

choices: David agrees with his brother and the twins decide to dominate together!
David wants to dominate even Dylan, and shoots himself again with the gun!
14212.content:
Davy had always been a very bright boy, with an I.Q just shy of the genius range. He got straight A's in school without much trouble and tended to slaughter even his buddy Benny at strategy board games. When it came to problem-solving and logical reasoning there was no one better in the entire Douglas family. Given Davy's admittedly impressive intellect, there are those who would condemn him vociferously for what he did next, but that isn't really fair.

Remember the situation: Davy had just witnessed a stunning transformation which all of his education told him was impossible. His twin brother, the person he was closest to and loved most in the world, had been turned into an immensely muscular super-boy and had immediately started thrashing their oldest brother, acting like a megalomaniac in a roid rage. It was clear no one in the family had even a prayer of stopping the fantastic physical powerhouse Dylan had become and Davy was terrified that Dylan really would kill Justin. Shocked, confused and frightened, the frantic fifteen year-old had thought only of balancing the equation, of introducing an equal and opposite variable which would cancel out his rampaging sibling. He wanted to turn into a real-life superhero and save everyone.

It didn't for one nanosecond occur to Davy to question what psychological effects the ray would have on him.

Davy heard Amber scream his name, but he couldn't answer her. The change was far from painless; every part of his body ached abominably and he felt the sharp prickling of pins and needles all over. The gun slipped out of his nerveless grasp, dropping to the carpeting. His eyes were tightly clenched as he strove silently against the agony. Still the unmistakable sound and feel of his shirt ripping apart and fluttering away from his expanding form pleased and comforted Davy.

When the pain and falling asleep sensation stopped he opened his eyes, only to find everything was blurry. His racing heart sped up even further as he wondered whether a side-effect of the device had further impaired his eye-sight. Then he realized what had happened.

Reaching up with his left hand he removed his black-framed glasses and the world snapped into focus. He could see so clearly now; he estimated he had at least twenty-twenty vision. He would never need these nerdy "extra eyes" again. With considerable pleasure and only one hand David effortlessly crush his glasses into a twisted lump of metal and shattered lenses.

Looking up he found himself the new center of attention. The only one not looking at him was Justin, who had gone entirely limp in Dylan's grasp. His throat was still encircled by his younger brother's hand, but Dylan had dropped his right arm down and Justin's lower body was now sprawled bonelessly across the floor.

While the rest of the family and Jerome stared wide-eyed at David, he and Dylan locked gazes. Not since babyhood had the twins looked so identical: two flaxen-haired, physically perfect paragons of teenage might and muscle.

"D-Davy!" their father stuttered, trying to take control of this insane situation. "Make Dylan let your brother go!"

The only response was a look of utter contempt from both twins. David started toward his father and Amber, Jerome and Debby scrambled to get out of his way.

How dare this pathetic excuse for a man try to tell him what to do, David raged inside! Didn't the idiot understand how much things had changed? He wasn't puny little Davy anymore; he was an iron-muscled Adonis who was undoubtedly one of the strongest men on Earth! He was so physically superior to his stick-figure father that Frank giving him orders was like an ant trying to command a giant.

"Shut up, old man! I could snap you in two like a twig!" David boasted, noting with pride that even his voice had gotten much deeper and more manly.

Frank qualied before the menacing muscle-boy, only increasing David's contempt for him. With one lightning-quick movement David seized the man, jerked him overhead and flung him into the nearest wall. Amber and Debby screamed and rushed to the crumpled, moaning, former head of the family. Jerome, by contrast, turned and sprinted for the front door.

Ignoring all of the insignifcant insects David turned to the only other important person in the room: Dylan.

"You undersand now, don't you, bro?" Dylan asked with a brotherly grin. "You finally get what it means to be strong, to be muscular. We're the ultimate apha males, David! We can do whatever we want, and no one can stop us!"
14212.title: Twin Titans of Terror!

choices: immediately started hulking out of his wife beater, surpassing a bodybuilder
He grows bigger instantly, filling out his wife beater, into a fitness model
Nothing happens yet, but the next day he is considerably bigger
Nothing happens, but when he gets angry he hulks out
Nothing happens, but when he touches someone he steals muscles and strength
15.content:
Justin’s eyes grew wide as he saw a blue beam shot out of the gun he was holding in his hand. Apparently it wasn’t a toy gun. He didn’t want to really pull the trigger, but he accidentally did. It didn’t take much either; only touched slightly made the gun shoot the strange blue light out of its barrel.

From the shock, Justin dropped the gun on the ground. He looked at his now empty hands and slowly started to tilt up his head. Did he hit someone? Maybe he didn’t…? But what if he did, would he have killed that person?

Justin’s eyes stared up in the same direction as he only just saw the blue beam travel. There, right in front of his gaze, was his best buddy Jerome. His entire body was radiating a faint blue color, only for a fraction of a second. He didn’t have a clue what hit him as he was still enjoying his steak and had not paid attention to his buddy shooting him.

Other members of the family, who had seen a strange blue beam shoot right in front of their eyes, had started to look up and join Justin’s gaze at Jerome on the far side of the table. Especially Amber, who had been eyeing up Jerome’s arms when he suddenly started radiating blue, looked at Jerome with her mouth open.

Jerome, putting a piece of steak in his mouth and chewing it, noticed everybody looking at him with surprise in their eyes. He looked around the table and asked very dry: “What?!?”
15.title: Jerome, the best buddy

choices: It was Justin, shooting himself
It was Amber, shooting Jerome once more
It was someone else from the family
152.content:
Chewing the last piece of his steak, Jerome couldn’t understand why the entire family was looking at him with surprise in their eyes. “What?”

Justin, being the one who shot him, decided to break the silence. “Uhm…you…you feel OK, buddy?”

Jerome laughed as he swallowed the meat. “Sure, I feel fantastic! Great steak, mr. Smith!”

Frank, having also noticed what had just happened, shook his head to get back to reality. “Oh…uhm…thanks! Glad you like it!”

“So…you don’t feel anything? Any different?” Justin continued to query.

“No, why should I?” Jerome replied still unknown to what hit him.

“So you didn’t notice it?” Dylan asked, who had been staring at Jerome’s chest, the point of impact of the blue beam, for the last minute or so.

Jerome looked down at his chest. He scratched it with his right hand as he felt an itch, causing his slightly developed pec to twitch as he moved his arm. Then he looked back up at Dylan, as there was nothing on his chest to see. “Noticed what?”

“I…I shot you…”, Justin added as he picked up the gun from the floor, “…with this!”

“What do you mean, you shot me?” Jerome asked slightly offended.

“I didn’t mean to…I just…I accidentally pulled the trigger…” Justin defended.

“Well, what is it? Did you hit me?”

“I don’t know what it is…”

“And it hit you straight in the chest…” Dylan added, who was still staring at Jerome’s chest. He could swear he saw something move.

Jerome scratched it again. “Well…since it didn’t kill me, and I don’t feel anything, it must have been something innocent.”

“I guess you’re right…” Justin said as he inspected the gun for any inscriptions or clues that could lead him to an answer. He found nothing, so he decided to put the gun back in the box and place the box on the ground under the table.

As the entire ordeal seemed to be about nothing, the family calmed down from the shock and continued with the dinner. Jerome, having already downed two steaks, took a third…and a fourth. He was extra hungry. Every now and then, however, he had to scratch the strange itch on his chest. He dismissed it as a mosquito bite or something like that.

As Jerome was cleaning his mouth with a napkin after he had finished his fourth steak, and the rest of the family had already finished eating for the last 10 minutes, Justin padded his buddy on the stomach.

“Where are you keeping all those steaks? You must be bloated!”

To Justin’s surprise, however, Jerome’s stomach didn’t feel bloated at all. Through the fabric of his wife beater he could clearly feel hard ridges of muscle. Out of shock he removed his hand as he looked as his buddy’s stomach. Faintly through the tight fabric, he could definitely see abs forming.

“Dude! Stop flexing your stomach…I know you work out…” Justin said as he knuckle-punched his buddy on the shoulder. It too felt harder.

Jerome looked at his buddy in surprise. “What do you mean? I’m not flexing…”

Justin, surprised by the hardness of his buddy’s skin, looked at him with disbelief. “Oh really, you don’t call this flexing?” he said as he grabbed the bottom of his buddy’s wife beater and pulled it up slightly to reveal his stomach. A perfectly defined six-pack appeared from under his buddy’s wife beater, just as dark brown as the rest of his skin.

Amber, who was still seated opposite Jerome, couldn’t believe her eyes as her brother had exposed Jerome’s abs. She had always wanted to see Jerome shirtless; this was a good start. She let out a soft “wow!”

“No, just feel it. As sorry as I am to break it to you, but this is my stomach not flexed…” Jerome said as he grabbed Justin’s hand and placed it on his stomach. Justin, amazed by the hardness, felt that he was telling the truth. He could dent the abs if he pressed and he felt they weren’t as hard as they could be.

“But how…you were never this ripped…” he started asking, when his buddy intervened.

“THIS is what they feel like flexed!” Jerome explained as he started tightening his stomach. Justin’s hand felt the muscles underneath the skin react instantly, growing bigger and harder within a mere second. The crevices between his individual abs grew deeper as his abs became more defined, more visual.

“But..but…how…” Justin’s reaction began as he started feeling up his buddy’s stomach all over.

Amber, not able to contain herself any longer, let out a loud “WOW! OH MY GOD!”

The rest of the family, who were doing their own thing, looked up at Amber and followed her stare towards Jerome’s hard, clearly defined six-pack. They all looked at it with amazement and jealousy.

Jerome visually enjoyed all the attention as a large smile appeared on his face, exposing his shiny white teeth. “You see, Justin, what did I tell you? You need to start working out to get the attention you deserve…”

“But…but…Jerome, have you looked at yourself already?!” Justin stammered as he took in the rest of his buddy’s body. Somehow, it seemed larger; he seemed to fill his wife beater with more muscle than before.

Jerome looked down at his buddy’s face, who was inspecting his body with care, as he continued to look down at his own physique. He knew he had a more defined physique than Justin, but what he saw even blew HIS mind.

His six-pack, still exposed for everyone to see, looked extremely cut and dry. Every individual ridge of muscle was clearly visible with zero body fat. On either side of his abs, he could see obliques he didn’t even know he had before. He tilted the upper part of his torso to tighten them, not believing his own eyes. With his free left hand, he felt this ridges of his obliques and abs over and over again. “But…but…” he stammered as he couldn’t quite understand where this definition came from.

As Jerome felt his own stomach up and down, Justin looked on at the arm attached to his friend’s hand. Jerome always had bigger arms than Justin; and he was constantly reminded of this by him. But the arms he saw now were even larger than Justin could remember. Without thinking he grabbed Jerome´s upper left arm with his right hand and squeezed it to check its hardness.

“DUDE!! Look at these!” he yelled still holding on to the arm.

Jerome, shifting his focus from his obliques to his upper arm, screamed from joy, surprise and satisfaction. “WHAT THE FUCK!?!”

He made a fist of his left hand and flexed the arm as hard as he could. Justin was still holding on to his upper arm, but as Jerome’s biceps grew his hand was pushed open.

“They’re huge and rock-hard!!” Justin concluded. He let go of his buddy’s arm, who in return started to feel up his upper arm with his own hand.

“What happened to me?!” he questioned as he felt the hardness of his new body.

The entire family had been looking on in awe, as Jerome discovered his newly grown physique. The girls looked on in admiration, while the boys all looked on in jealousy.

“Could this be the gun I shot you with?!?” Justin remarked as he suddenly remembered what had happened to his buddy right before the transformation.

“You think?!?” Jerome queried as he moved his hand over other parts of his body to inspect if they had become bigger. His chest, his shoulders, his thighs…every single part of his physique had increased in size considerably. He felt his clothes hugging tighter around his body.

“That’s all I can think of…” Justin said as he looked at the box with the gun inside under the table.

Then Jerome, still seated in the chair behind the table, noticed his reflection in one of the windows of the house. Curious to see what he looked like, he stood up and walked over to the window. The family looked on as he walked much different than before. He was definitely wider, he had a certain swagger and his arms hang further away from his body as his back was spread out more. The wife beater, which had already looked good on him before, was filled to the max with much more muscle than before.

When he stood in front of the window, giving him a perfect full-size reflection of his body, he took off his wife beater completely and looked in awe at his own shirtless torso staring back at him. He couldn’t help but flex some of his new muscles similarly to what a body builder would do, just to show their size.

“Dang…I’m ripped!”

As he continued performing some body building poses he noticed something in the reflection move. The lid of the box under the table was opened and someone was holding the gun in his hands…
152.title: Jerome the model

choices: …hulked out of his clothes, as huge as a professional bodybuilder
…looking buff, filling up his clothes nicely
…not looking any different
153.content:
“What?!” Jerome asked the dozen questioning eyes that stared at him from around the table.

Justin was the first one to speak. “You…you feel OK, buddy?”

Jerome looked at Justin strangely. “Why wouldn’t I feel OK?” he asked back.

“Well…it’s just that…” Justin started as he was too afraid to admit he had shot his best friend. Luckily, Dylan fills in that spot. “…He shot you!”

Jerome looks at Dylan, raises an eyebrow and looks back at Justin again. “What’s he talking about?!?” Then he noticed Justin still holding the strange toy gun in his hand. “You’ve shot me with that?!?”

“Yeah…” Justin replied.

“So what’s to worry? It’s a toy! Come on…nothing happened!”

“But a blue beam came out of it, shooting you in the chest!” Davy added.

“Well then it’s probably a very expensive, elaborate toy gun. Maybe it’s a laser pointer…who knows!” Jerome said as he didn’t understand why everybody was looking at him so strangely.

“So you’re really feeling fine then?” Justin asked one final time.

“Yeah, buddy! Nothing to worry about!”, Jerome said as he scooped up some more potatoes, “The dinner is really nice, Mrs. Smith! You’ve outdone yourself!”

“Why thank you Jerome, would you like some more gravy?” Debby said a bit blushing from the compliment. She dismissed the entire incident from happening and happily switched the subject of the conversation; as did everybody else.

Justin, however, wasn’t entirely sure if they should act as if nothing had happened. He looked one more time at the gun in his hands and got a bad vibe from it. “Let’s keep this one safe, for now…” he said to himself as he went inside to hide the gun in his room.

As he came back, the entire family was discussion the weather, sports, comics and everything else besides the shooting incident. They were enjoying their dessert when Justin decided to join again. He looked strangely at his best buddy, inspecting his entire body, especially his chest were the beam hit, but couldn’t find anything out of the ordinary. Maybe Jerome was telling the truth; maybe nothing is going on.

The family finished dinner when the evening started to set in; it became dark. Jerome, promising his mother that he would be back home before dark, said goodbye and left. Justin decided to go back to his room to catch up on some of his homework. In reality, however, he booted up his laptop and went online to search for any background information on the strange looking gun. He found a German website with a small picture of a similar looking gun. Some words in the text were “Kraft”, “Muskeln”, “wachsen” and when he Google Translated a piece of the text, he found out that the gun was developed during the Cold War in Eastern Germany to enhance German soldiers. The device was claimed dangerous and forbidden and was banned from the country. Few guns survived.

Justin scratched the back of his head as he looked at the gun. So if he understood the text correctly, the gun could give any human being more muscles and thus more strength. His best friend Jerome would experience gains in strength and muscle definition; he laughed at the idea. That would be absurd.

It was getting late, so he put the gun back in the box and placed it on the top shelf of his closet. Then he turned off his laptop, turned off the lights and went to bed.
The next morning, Justin’s alarm went off at 6am. He rubbed the sleep from his eyes as he slowly woke up. After a long, hot, refreshing shower he went downstairs for breakfast. His mother was already up, having prepared breakfast, and his father was in the shower. The twins and Amber were still asleep as they had to get up much later.

After breakfast Justin went back upstairs to pack his bag for the day. He only had three classes, so he could pack light. As he put the books in his bag, the box on the top shelf of his closet caught his attention. He decided, just for fun, to pack the gun as well. Just at that moment, the doorbell rang.

Justin ran downstairs, yelling that he’d get the door. When he opened, Jerome was there…

All I can say is Your Going to be Big! Infact I bet you will be one of the biggest guys if not the Biggest guy in school!"

info.brief_description: Meet the Smiths, a suburban family whose lives are about to change when a parcel arrives..
info.description:
Meet the Smith family; an ordinary suburban household of six whose lives are bound to drastically change, for the better or the worse, you decide. First, let’s meet the family members:

Frank Smith – 45 – 152lbs – 6ft1 – sales manager at canned food factory
Frank Smith is the father of the household with an important job at a local factory. He is extremely skinny for his height. His work consumes most of his time, as does his red-haired co-worker Vanessa. His little affaire might cost him his job, but Vanessa’s sexiness keeps him from breaking up. The office-affaire is a closely guarded secret, even from his wife and children, until not long from now…

Debby Smith – 43 – 188lbs – 5ft7 – librarian at local library
Somewhat chubby, dark haired, blue-eyed Debby Smith is the wife of Frank and the mother of four loving children. Whenever she isn’t at home slaving away as a housewife, she spends her time as a librarian in the local library. It’s a small job, on voluntary basis, but it keeps her from losing her mind if she stays at home all day. She has a secret crush on the hunky neighbor from across the street, Joe, but it hasn’t led to anything serious yet…

Justin Smith – 19 – 142lbs – 5ft9 – sophomore student at college
Justin is an avid sports fan, only unfortunately for him merely a passive one. His tryouts for the college football, basketball and baseball teams have all let to disappointments: he was considered too small, too thin, lacking too much strength. Unfortunately for him he has his father’s genes. He now spends his free time working at the local Wal-Mart, at the sports section no less, with his co-worker and best buddy Jerome. He wants to move out of the house, but his budget prevents him from doing this.

Amber Smith – 17 – 132lbs – 5ft6 – senior year of high school
Amber Smith is the silent wallflower of the family. She inherited the same chubby features as her mother, although her hair is perfectly straight and dark. As the middle child, she always gets the blame. At school she is the same silent, awkward type with a very small group of friends. All she ever wants is get noticed, both at home as well as at school. She has a crush on Jerome, the hunky best friend of her big brother, but Jerome hardly knows she exists.

Dylan and Davy Smith – 15 – 138lbs and 121lbs – 5ft9 – twins – high school sophomores
The two youngest members of the family, Dylan and Davy, are twins, but they couldn’t be more different. Dylan is an active, over energetic, 15-year-old with a passion for sports and a fit body to support it, while Davy is considered a typical book worm. He is an avid comic book fan and knows how to quote ever issue of Superman ever released. He wears similar dark-rimmed glasses as Clark Kent. From the faces you would see they are twins, but from the neck down they are completely different. While Davy spends his free time in the library and at the comic book store, Dylan is training in a nearby gymnasium to become a better gymnast. He wishes to run with the pros, but he misses serious strength to complete the exercises perfectly, all the fault of his lackluster gene-pool. Although the twins think of each other as either “complete nerd” or “knucklehead jock”, they do love each other in the end. Even during their many arguments and disagreements.

Now that you have met the main family, it is also good to know that there are some important supporting characters to make the story more interesting. A small selection:

Joe Daniels – good looking, single, neighbor from across the street
Vanessa Raspberry – good looking, single, co-worker at Frank’s work
Jerome Fillmore – Justin’s African-American best friend, classmate and co-worker at Wal-Mart
Brittney Michaels – Amber’s best friend and classmate, has a hunky big brother
Brett Michaels – Brittney’s big brother who is a class ahead at the same college of Justin and Jerome, quarterback of the college football team, helped the coach to prevent Justin from joining the team
Vlad Petrovsky – gymnastics buddy of Dylan, parents from Czech Republic, but born in America, who is selected for the national team
Benny Williams – comic book nerd and best buddy of Davy
Dwayne Fillmore – Jerome’s father, a former wrestling champion, now used car salesman, big guy
Hope Fillmore – Jerome’s mother, good friends with Debby, slim and trained physique
Kim Surname – the hot babe of Justin and Jerome’s class, both guys have a crush on her

It’s springtime in California when the lives of the Smith family are about to change forever. Every member of the family is in one way or another not happy with their looks and appearance; they all wish to be a bit bigger, a bit stronger or a bit taller. Little do they know that their wishes are about to come true when a strange parcel arrives on the front porch. It’s up to you to decide who grows first and what consequences that has on the rest of the story! Enjoy!


Ground rules
- No sex, no vore, no deaths, no anthros, no transformations, no body swap, no giants, no giantesses
- Muscle growth and size growth only, but keep it believable. Not bigger than 300 lbs and taller than 7ft. Both male and female can grow
- Make chapters longer than at least one sentence or paragraph. Try to avoid the ‘question chapters’; chapters which contain only one question to advance the story
- I retain the right to alter or delete chapters if they do not fit the story line or follow these ground rules
- Feel free to introduce new characters, but try to stay centered on the main character's family
